Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3560084/","name":"NCIS: New Orleans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM3OTk1NTQyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3560084/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"household137","dateCreated":"2014-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Review of NCIS New Orleans","reviewBody":"As a New Orleans native I implore you and the writers to walk down any street in New Orleans and talk to a LOCAL. We DO NOT eat shrimp and grits for breakfast and praline bacon isn't in our fridge. We have worked very hard to come back from Katrina and it PAINS ME that this series (which I love and watch regularly) is making us look like uneducated loud mouth pigs. Please - come uptown and take a census of LOCALS, have a LOCAL help you with the dialect!! We DO NOT talk like that unless your're from Mississippi. PLEASE! I LOVE my city and would LOVE for the series to continue and for us New Orleanians to sound like the intelligent up and coming tech community that we are! programme.title: L'entente cordiale
programme.desc: Viktor Zilenko, ancien membre du KGB reconverti dans des trafics de toutes sortes, a volé une puce électronique et la propose au plus offrant. Le gouvernement français, avec une offre de 25 millions de dollars, emporte l'affaire. François de la Conche, ancien diplomate, est chargé de mener à bien la transaction, avec pour adjoint un certain Jean-Pierre Moindrau. Mais les deux hommes se détestent.

programme.title: Le cercle
programme.desc: "Le Cercle" est un magazine de débats et de critiques cinéphiles animé par un journaliste en compagnie de chroniqueurs et en présence d'un public d'étudiants en cinéma.

programme.title: Petit pays
programme.desc: En 1992, à Bujumbura, au Burundi, Gaby et ses amis s'introduisent discrètement dans les jardins de riches propriétaires occidentaux pour récolter des fruits, qu'ils revendent aussitôt à la sauvette aux automobilistes. Mais pour le jeune garçon, ce n'est qu'un jeu. Gaby vit en effet de façon aisée entre sa petite soeur, sa mère rwandaise, Yvonne, et son père Michel Chapaz, un entrepreneur français. Mais cette existence relativement paisible se fissure quand leurs parents se séparent et que des conflits entre Tutsis et Hutus commencent à éclater.

programme.title: Top of the Shorts
programme.desc: Chaque dimanche, Top of the Shorts fait la part belle à une grande variété de courts métrages qu'elle propose en version originale sous-titrée. L'émission met en valeur une discipline exigeante qui séduit autant les jeunes comédiens ou réalisateurs que des artistes renommés.

programme.title: Little Women
Les filles du docteur March
programme.desc:
Little Women: Directed by Greta Gerwig. With Saoirse Ronan, Emma Watson, Florence Pugh, Eliza Scanlen. programme.title: Minamata
Minamata
programme.desc:
Minamata: Directed by Andrew Levitas. With Akiko Iwase, Kogarashi Wakasugi, Johnny Depp, Katherine Jenkins. War photographer W. Eugene Smith travels back to Japan where he documents the devastating effect of mercury poisoning in coastal communities." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9179096/","name":"Minamata","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGVkNTFjY2QtZTBkMi00YTE2LTk1NTYtNGRjZTUwMTA2ZjcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"War photographer W. Eugene Smith travels back to Japan where he documents the devastating effect of mercury poisoning in coastal communities.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9179096/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"anthonyjlangford"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Depp a Star","reviewBody":"Johnny Depp has what many actors don't. Even the current so called top tier ones. Charisma. Star power. Whatever that x factor is, he has it. And has done for 35 years. The fact that he has been cancelled by the Hollywood feminist/woke brigade is a disgrace. He has not been found guilty of anything. He initiated a defamation case that was not successful. The only person admitting to DV in a recording was that horrid entity he was with. Her career goes on and she can barely act. This man is a star. It's simply sexist hypocrisy. Put him back on the screen where he belongs.

Is the film good? Yes. Well shot and directed. Interesting story. Is it great? No, not great but for every moment he's in it, it's elevated. He's perfectly cast for this charismatic figure because that's Johnny. He has the goods. And always has.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13903,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-02-05","keywords":"war photographer,japan,poisoning,american abroad,mercury poisoning","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1552466201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBkMzk0OTctOTQ4ZC00YTU3LTgwOTItYjZkN2M1ZmQzMjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBkMzk0OTctOTQ4ZC00YTU3LTgwOTItYjZkN2M1ZmQzMjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"New York, 1971. Following his celebrated days as one of the most revered photojournalists of World War II, W. Eugene Smith (Johnny Depp) has become a recluse, disconnected from society and his career. But a secret commission from Life magazine editor Robert Hayes (Bill Nighy) sends him to the Japanese coastal city of Minamata, which has been ravaged by mercury poisoning; the result of decades of gross industrial negligence by the country's Chisso Corporation.
 
There, Smith immerses himself in the community, documenting their efforts to live with Minamata Disease and their passionate campaign to achieve recognition from Chisso and the Japanese government. Armed with only his trusted camera, Smith's images from the toxic village give the disaster a heartbreaking human dimension, and his initial assignment turns into a life-changing experience."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7414957/","name":"Akiko Iwase"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11440820/","name":"Kogarashi Wakasugi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000136/","name":"Johnny Depp"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506165/","name":"Andrew Levitas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0325436/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121295/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0135149/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2005691/","name":"David Kessler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1634253/","name":"Stephen Deuters"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506165/","name":"Andrew Levitas"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

Following his celebrated days as one of the most revered photojournalists of World War II, W. Eugene Smith (Johnny Depp) has become a recluse, disconnected from society and his career. But a secret commission from Life magazine editor Robert Hayes (Bill Nighy) sends him to the Japanese coastal city of Minamata, which has been ravaged by mercury poisoning; the result of decades of gross industrial negligence by the country's Chisso Corporation.
 
There, Smith immerses himself in the community, documenting their efforts to live with Minamata Disease and their passionate campaign to achieve recognition from Chisso and the Japanese government. Armed with only his trusted camera, Smith's images from the toxic village give the disaster a heartbreaking human dimension, and his initial assignment turns into a life-changing experience.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7414957/","name":"Akiko Iwase","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11440820/","name":"Kogarashi Wakasugi","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000136/","name":"Johnny Depp"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506165/","name":"Andrew Levitas"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0325436/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121295/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0135149/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2005691/","name":"David Kessler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1634253/","name":"Stephen Deuters","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506165/","name":"Andrew Levitas"],"duration":"PT1H55M"</script><metacontent="
Category: Drama|Drama
https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGVkNTFjY2QtZTBkMi00YTE2LTk1NTYtNGRjZTUwMTA2ZjcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,0,190,281_.jpg

programme.desc: Epuisée par les différentes étapes du changement climatique, la Terre est devenue peu à peu inhabitable. Les espèces végétales se sont éteintes et l'oxygène s'est faite extrêmement rare, entrainant la fin des civilisations mondiales. Seule une ville en Australie est parvenue à survivre et ses habitants, plongés dans les ténèbres, luttent pied à pied pour produire de l'énergie et de l'oxygène synthétique fabriqué par la société privée ChroniCorp. Ethan Whyte, un des employés de la société, est convoqué avec son frère Richard par leur directrice Regina Jackson : ils sont chargés d'une mission temporelle vitale.

programme.title: Love Me
programme.desc: Dans un aéroport américain, une jeune femme, Gabrielle, erre, égarée. Elle ne sait plus qui elle est, ni où elle est, encore moins ce qu'elle fait là. Abordée par un homme armé, elle prend la fuite et rencontre Gloria, qui la conduit dans un night-club. Là, elle fait la connaissance d'un vieux rocker..

programme.title: Dans tes rêves
programme.desc: Ixe, alias Patrick Grégoire, n'a qu'un rêve : vivre de son rap, au grand dam de sa mère qui voudrait le faire rentrer à la Poste. Soutenu par ses copains de la cité de la rue des Poissonniers, dans le 18e arrondissement de Paris, le jeune homme démarche les maisons de disques. Un jour, en écoutant la radio, il apprend qu'Ava, célèbre productrice, prépare une comédie musicale sur l'histoire du hip-hop.

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Nos programmes se terminent pour cette journée, en attendant ceux de demain.

programme.title: Le cercle
programme.desc: "Le Cercle" est un magazine de débats et de critiques cinéphiles animé par un journaliste en compagnie de chroniqueurs et en présence d'un public d'étudiants en cinéma.

programme.title: Tomiris
programme.desc: A l'époque de l'apogée et de la puissance de l'empire perse, Cyrus le Grand avait conquis la moitié du monde. Mais le peuple Saka avait su conserver ses terres. Parmi ses habitants se trouvait la vaillante tribu des Massagètes. Spargapisès, vaillant guerrier de cette tribu, apprend, en rentrant d'une sanglante bataille que son épouse Bopaï, mourante, vient de lui donner un enfant, une fille, qu'elle baptise Tomiris. Les années passent et Spargapisès entraîne sa fille unique afin qu'elle devienne une guerrière forte et courageuse.

Epuisée par les différentes étapes du changement climatique, la Terre est devenue peu à peu inhabitable. Les espèces végétales se sont éteintes et l'oxygène s'est faite extrêmement rare, entrainant la fin des civilisations mondiales. Seule une ville en Australie est parvenue à survivre et ses habitants, plongés dans les ténèbres, luttent pied à pied pour produire de l'énergie et de l'oxygène synthétique fabriqué par la société privée ChroniCorp. Ethan Whyte, un des employés de la société, est convoqué avec son frère Richard par leur directrice Regina Jackson : ils sont chargés d'une mission temporelle vitale.

programme.title: The Division
programme.desc: A Rio de Janeiro, en 1997, la ville est le théâtre de onze enlèvements par mois, laissant la population dans la terreur, et les autorités totalement désemparées. Au cours d'une conférence de presse télévisée, Pablo Gaspar, le chef de la police, dénonce une corruption massive des forces de l'ordre et du pouvoir judiciaire, permettant à cet inquiétant phénomène de prendre de l'ampleur. Afin de mettre fin au phénomène, deux policiers très différents son choisis pour former équipe : l'impulsif et violent Mendonça, et Juliano Santiago, connu pour son éthique limitée.

programme.title: Jumanji : Next Level
programme.desc: Une année a passé depuis que Spencer, Bethany, Martha et Anthony ont été projetés à l'intérieur du jeu Jumanji. Tous ont fini le lycée et mènent des existences très différentes. Alors que Bethany parcourt le monde, Martha réussit ses études à l'université et Anthony, dit «Fridge», est un sportif accompli. Seul Spencer végète dans une épicerie à New York, avant de rejoindre quelques jours sa mère et son grand-père Eddie. Démoralisé, il ressort la cartouche de jeu Jumanji qu'il conservait dans une malle.

programme.title: Judas and the Black Messiah
programme.desc: En 1968, à Chicago, Bill O'Neal se fait passer pour un agent fédéral afin de voler des voitures. Il est vite arrêté et se voir proposer un marché par Roy Mitchell, agent spécial pour le FBI : toutes les charges retenues contre lui seront abandonnées s''il accepte d'infiltrer la section de l'Illinois du Black Panther Party et de son leader, le charismatique orateur Fred Hampton. En contact régulier avec Hampton, O'Neill apprend à mieux connaître un personnage d'une grande intelligence, qui parvient à fédérer des gens venus d'horizons divers.

programme.title: Malasaña 32
programme.desc: En 1976, la famille Olmedo quitte la campagne pour s’installer dans un vieil immeuble de Madrid. Ils ne savent pas que d’étranges phénomènes se déroulaient par le passé dans leur appartement. L’ancienne occupante y est morte, laissant toutes ses affaires. Amparo, adolescente qui rêve de devenir hôtesse de l’air, assiste peu à peu à des choses étranges. Le premier soir, elle voit une vieille dame en compagnie de Rafa, son petit frère. Et tous les vêtements qu’elle avait jetés réapparaissent mystérieusement dans l’armoire. Pepe, l’aîné, est troublé par une voisine entraperçue...

programme.title: Le nuage
programme.desc: Capucine, sa mère malade, et Eugénie prennent la route pour tenter de fuir le nuage de cendres radioactif qui arrive droit sur leur petite ville.

programme.title: Contaminations
programme.desc: Gigi Cutler, cadre supérieure dans une société pétrolifère, la Shore Oil, est au coeur d'une tourmente médiatique et financière d'importance. a tel point que la jeune femme est convoquée par son patron pour comprendre l'origine du désastre. Gigi revient alors sur sa rencontre avec Fred Stern, important producteur d'amandes en Californie, veuf depuis un an. Au départ cordiales, les relations entre Cutler et Stern étaient cordiales, jusqu'à ce que la jeune femme tente de racheter une partie des terres du cultivateur.

programme.title: Pachamama
programme.desc: Dans un petit village indien de la cordillère des Andes, Tepulpaï, un jeune garçon facétieux, fait tout pour impressionner son entourage et notamment son amie Naïra. Tepulpaï, comme les autres habitants du village, doit régulièrement faire offrande de ce qu'il a de plus précieux à Pachamama, créature magique garante de la richesse et de l'abondance des récoltes de la région. Mais, au contraire de Naïra, Tepulpaï est incapable de faire preuve de générosité, prouvant son immaturité. La situation du village se complique quand un représentant officiel des incas s'empare de la statue dorée représentant Pachamama.

programme.title: La Bostella
programme.desc: Edouard et sa bande animent chaque semaine une émission comique télévisée de trois minutes. Mais voici qu'ils doivent réaliser un magazine quotidien de vingt-six minutes pour une grande chaîne nationale. Edouard loue donc une villa en Provence pour préparer l'émission durant le mois d'août avec la troupe. Mais rien ne se passe comme ils l'avaient prévu.

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Nos programmes se terminent pour cette journée, en attendant ceux de demain.

programme.title: Groland le replait
programme.desc: Retrouvez les meilleurs moments des 7 Jours au Groland, et un résumé des dernières péripéties vécues par les habitants de la célèbre présipauté.

programme.title: Les choses qu'on dit, les choses qu'on fait
Les choses qu'on dit, les choses qu'on fait
programme.desc:
Les choses qu'on dit, les choses qu'on fait: Directed by Emmanuel Mouret. With Camélia Jordana, Niels Schneider, Vincent Macaigne, Émilie Dequenne. Waiting for her boyfriend to join her on a country vacation, three months pregnant Daphne bonds with his cousin Maxime, and their shared intimacy brings them closer together into a full fledged love affair." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12443930/","name":"Les choses qu'on dit, les choses qu'on fait","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmZjYjEzNjAtMTVhNS00ZmY0LWJmMWEtYWNkOWFjYTYwMjUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzM3NDI3._V1_.jpg","description":"Waiting for her boyfriend to join her on a country vacation, three months pregnant Daphne bonds with his cousin Maxime, and their shared intimacy brings them closer together into a full fledged love affair.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12443930/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danybur"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The human comedy (and Mozartian)","reviewBody":"Summary

Over two hours, Emmanuel Mouret (director and screenwriter) unfolds this admirable human comedy (in the Balzacian sense) of intertwined stories, with the motives of his characters centered on desire and love and the delicate balance between what They tell each other, what they do, what they feel, what they show (us), the tacit or explicit agreements and the imponderable. And he does it using different tones and genres and supported by extraordinary performances.

Review:

Maxime goes to a country house to spend a few days with his cousin Francois and Daphné, his partner. But Francois had to leave before his arrival and Maxime and Daphné will spend a few days alone chatting and revealing their respective sentimental stories.

Emmanuel Mouret (director and guinosta) achieves an admirable mosaic of intertwined stories. In the first place, there are two main stories, with their respective points of view: Daphné's and Maxime's, each developed with a different tone, with some voice-over introducing or commenting on the flashbacks that alternate. On the other hand, there is the present time, where the point of view is that of the spectator. Then other moments with other points of view will be added.

The inventory of situations is overwhelming, exposed without haste and without pause, with flirtations, friendships, courtships, couples, marriages and infidelities, always highlighting the difference between "what is said and what is done", to what I I would add "what it feels like."

And yes: it is a French film with a literary imprint where the characters talk a lot about what happens to them, but where they are also silent as much. The style of the story refers to various cinematographies, depending on which story and characters it is and at what point in the story we find ourselves: at times it seems like a Rohmer film and at others a very subtle humor close to Woody Allen appears, for example. Different tones of comedy (tangled, romantic, sentimental), melodrama and drama are combined, with extraordinary use of a soundtrack with classical music ranging from Purcell and Haydn to Poulenc. In this way, the sequence of scenes could also be assimilated to a series of recitatives and arias from a Mozart opera. But beyond the references and influences, the result is absolutely personal.

Far from causing dispersion, the script solidly interweaves the stories, sheds new light in their recesses and the dramatic crescendo is incessant, reaching an extremely emotional climax.

Within a solid cast, Niels Schneider stands out as Maxime, a timid aspiring writer (in the antipodes of the manipulative Philippe who played in An Impossible Love or the Object of Desire in Dolan's Imaginary Loves), Camélia Jordana who brings all her expressiveness to Daphné, a film editor, Vincent Macaigne as the endearing Francois, Daphne's partner and Émilie Dequenne's Louise, with all her surprising edges.

In sum, over the course of two hours, Mouret unfolds this remarkable human comedy in the Balzacian sense, with the motives of his characters centered on desire and love and the delicate balance between what they say to each other, what they do, what they feel, what (to us and is) shown and hidden, seduction games, tacit or explicit agreements, renunciations, confusion, the imponderable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1582,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-09-16","keywords":"paris france,cannes 2020,pregnant woman,countryside,flashback","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [VOST]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1976156441","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTczNTJiNTctOWJjYi00NDcxLTlkMmUtNGVjOTQ1ZDgzZTg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTczNTJiNTctOWJjYi00NDcxLTlkMmUtNGVjOTQ1ZDgzZTg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3874127/","name":"Camélia Jordana"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2671105/","name":"Niels Schneider"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0531195/","name":"Vincent Macaigne"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0609981/","name":"Emmanuel Mouret"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090290/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0346444/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0609981/","name":"Emmanuel Mouret"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: La nuit venue
La nuit venue
programme.desc: La nuit venue: Directed by Frédéric Farrucci. With Guang Huo, Camélia Jordana, Xun Liang, Maurice Cheng. One night, Noémie, a stripper and bewitching call girl, gets into Jin's cab. Intrigued by Jin's muteness, she asks him to become her official taxi. As the nights go by, a beautiful but dangerous love story develops between them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9262952/","name":"La nuit venue","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTViZTAxODAtOWNkNy00ODAxLWFlNTEtODQ4MDc1NDk0ZTgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODc0OTEyNDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"One night, Noémie, a stripper and bewitching call girl, gets into Jin's cab. Antoinette dans les Cévennes
programme.desc: Antoinette dans les Cévennes: Directed by Caroline Vignal. With Laure Calamy, Benjamin Lavernhe, Olivia Côte, Marc Fraize. Le mariage de Rosa
programme.desc: La boda de Rosa: Directed by Icíar Bollaín. With Candela Peña, Sergi López, Nathalie Poza, Ramón Barea. Rosa is about to turn 45 and realises that she's always lived her life to serve everyone else. So she decides to leave it all behind and take charge of her life and fulfil her dream of starting her own business" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10077544/","name":"La boda de Rosa","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGZiYjc5MzItZjY5MC00NTg5LWJkNzQtNzBjMTI3ZDQ0MzFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Rosa is about to turn 45 and realises that she's always lived her life to serve everyone else. After all these years I still tear up during certain scenes. That never happened here. Not even almost! I actually think I dosed off for a minute somewhere in the middle of it. programme.title: En aparté
programme.desc: Une personnalité est invitée par Nathalie Levy à évoquer son actualité et à parler de sa vie et de sa carrière. L'entretien se déroule dans un appartement où l'invité est seul et répond aux questions de son hôte dont on n'entend que la voix.

programme.title: L'enfer sous terre
programme.desc: En septembre 1915, au Royaume Uni, alors que tous attendent la fin de la guerre, les hommes valides s'enrôlent pour accomplir leur devoir. Ce qui refuse reçoivent une plume blanche, symbole de lâcheté et de traîtrise. William Hawkins, recalé plusieurs fois pour des raisons de santé, tente malgré tout d'être enrôlé pour aller sur le front. Henry, lui, est pris, à la grande fierté de son père. Quelques mois plus tard, le jeune homme, simple soldat, se retrouve dans les tranchées alors que la bataille de la Somme fait rage.

programme.title: Groland le replait
programme.desc: Retrouvez les meilleurs moments des 7 Jours au Groland, et un résumé des dernières péripéties vécues par les habitants de la célèbre présipauté.

programme.title: Princesse Europe
programme.desc: En 2019, trois mois avant les élections européennes, Bernard-Henri Lévy, infatigable défenseur de l’Union européenne, décide de jouer dans une vingtaine de capitales du continent sa pièce de théâtre, "Looking for Europe". Sur scène, arpentant une chambre d’hôtel imaginaire, le philosophe incarne un écrivain censé rédiger l’éloge d’une Europe qui se meurt. Parallèlement au filmage des représentations, le réalisateur Camille Lotteau décide de sortir des théâtres et des palais, à la rencontre des pensées, des opinions et des visages des Européens d’aujourd’hui.

programme.title: Divorce Club
programme.desc: Suite à un souci de micro, Ben apprend lors d’un événement en public que sa femme le trompe. Dans la foulée, elle demande le divorce. Ben est dévasté. A un cercle de parole de divorcés, il croise Patrick, un ami perdu de vue depuis longtemps. Ce dernier est millionnaire et propose à Ben de s’installer avec lui dans sa magnifique villa. Là, les deux amis entament une vie de célibataires sans contraintes. Ils sont bientôt rejoints par Albane, une organisatrice de mariage qui vient tout juste de divorcer. De son côté, Ben, agent immobilier, est troublé par une cliente.

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Nos programmes se terminent pour cette journée, en attendant ceux de demain.

programme.desc: Retrouvez les meilleurs moments des 7 Jours au Groland, et un résumé des dernières péripéties vécues par les habitants de la célèbre présipauté.

Quelques mois plus tard, le jeune homme, simple soldat, se retrouve dans les tranchées alors que la bataille de la Somme fait rage.

programme.title: Unknown Battle
programme.desc: Pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale à Rjev, en Union soviétique.. Après une bataille entre l'armée allemande et l'Armée rouge, non loin du village d'Ovsyannikovo, les troupes soviétiques, réduites de moitié, se retrouvent obligées de survivre dans un environnement glacial, tandis que des allemands sont en approche. Dépourvus de tout soutient logistique, ces soldats épuisés sont pourtant obligés par le commandement de tenir le village, considéré comme hautement stratégique, à n'importe quel prix.

programme.title: Groland le replait
programme.desc: Retrouvez les meilleurs moments des 7 Jours au Groland, et un résumé des dernières péripéties vécues par les habitants de la célèbre présipauté.

programme.title: Edge of the World
programme.desc: En 1839, l'Empire britannique s'étend sur une grande partie du monde. Sir James Brooke, ancien soldat dans l'armée du Bengale, navigue vers Bornéo en compagnie de son cousin, le colonel Arthur Crookshank, de son jeune neveu, Charles, et de Subu, un interprète. Sur place, les hommes sont rapidement présentés au riche sultan de Sarawak. Les sujets de la reine Victoria, qui affirment être mandatés par la couronne, apprennent que le sultanat est menacé par une série de révoltes de seigneurs de tribus régionales.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: A Rio de Janeiro, Sabina Wilson et Jane Kano, deux agentes expertes des Charlie's Angels, mènent à bien une mission délicate. Un an plus tard, à Hambourg, Elena Houghlin, talentueuse développeuse informatique, tente en vain de signaler à son supérieur qu'un défaut majeur menace le bon fonctionnement d'un logiciel qu'ils développent. Quelques instants plus tard, elle et discrètement approchée par une agente des Charlie's Angels. Au même moment, John Bosley fête sa future retraite bien méritée.

programme.title: Un conte peut en cacher un autre
programme.desc: Et si chaque nuit, Jack, celui du conte au haricot magique, rêvait de Cendrillon ? Et si le Petit Chaperon rouge était la meilleure amie de Blanche-Neige ? Et si cette dernière était blonde ? Et si le loup ne croquait plus le petit cochon ? C'est que laisse supposer le loup qui se retrouve face à une baby-sitter nourrie aux contes de fées. Le loup s'empresse de lui raconter sa version de ses histoires, en omettant de dire qu'il a un passif avec Blanche-Neige et le Petit Chaperon (il a voulu en faire son dîner et qu'elle s'est bien défendue)...

programme.title: Un conte peut en cacher un autre
programme.desc: Et si chaque nuit, Jack, celui du conte au haricot magique, rêvait de Cendrillon ? Et si le Petit Chaperon rouge était la meilleure amie de Blanche-Neige ? Et si cette dernière était blonde ? Et si le loup ne croquait plus le petit cochon ? C'est que laisse supposer le loup qui se retrouve face à une baby-sitter nourrie aux contes de fées..

programme.title: Les génériques de séries
programme.desc: Le générique d'une série revêt une importance primordiale. A l'instar d'une empreinte digitale, il permet, dès les premières notes, de créer l'univers de la fiction. Certains sont entrés dans la mémoire collective comme celui d'Amicalement vôtre composé par John Barry, Mad Men conçu notamment par Peter Frankfurt, ou encore Twin Peaks bercé par la musique d'Angelo Badalamenti.

programme.title: Soupçons (The Staircase)
programme.sub-title: Le procureur joue au plus malin

programme.title: Les Nouveaux Mutants
programme.desc: Alors que la réserve dans laquelle elle vie est frappée par une violente tempête, Dani Moonstar, une jeune amérindienne, est réveillée par son père qui l'aide à trouver un abri avant de mourir en tentant de porter secours à d'autres victimes des éléments déchaînés. La jeune femme se réveille quelque temps plus tard enchaînée à un lit d'une institution spécialisée destinée à accueillir des jeunes gens aux pouvoirs hors du commun. En charge de l'établissement, le docteur Reyes lui explique qu'elle est la seule survivante du drame qu'elle a traversé.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Présenté par le talentueux Jimmy Fallon, The Tonight Show, diffusé d'abord aux Etats-Unis, propose un moment unique : interviews décalées, gags délirants, parodies hilarantes, sketchs mythiques, défis rocambolesques. Une pléiade de stars est invitée chaque soir pour contribuer à ce grand moment de divertissement et d'humour.

Soupçons
programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0388644, Title: Soupçons, --- Description: Soupçons: With Michael Peterson, David Rudolf, Ron Guerette, Martha Ratliff. The high-profile murder trial of American novelist Michael Peterson following the death of his wife in 2001." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0388644/","name":"Soupçons","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU4NTE3MDY4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk4NjY1NTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The high-profile murder trial of American novelist Michael Peterson following the death of his wife in 2001.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0388644/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"smcgilli-2","dateCreated":"2018-06-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting story but horrible editing","reviewBody":"I wont go over the whole story here as many other have already done so. Yes, this is a tragic story and has some interesting twists. Yes, I feel that justice was not well served for this whole investigation and trial. However, this 13 episode series could have easily been edited down to 6 or 7 episodes. There is SO much fluff. There are SO many scenes that drag on or rehash the same info. The characters are just not that interesting to hear them go on and on. They even have drawn out scenes of cars parking or driving away or people walking...nothing going on. No drama. No storytelling. No point. It makes a slow story feel a LOT slower.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20731,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary","Crime","Drama"],"keywords":"columnist,blowpoke,true crime,blood,staircase","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2023399/","name":"Michael Peterson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5308683/","name":"David Rudolf","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5509614/","name":"Ron Guerette"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070801/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Staircase - Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2745482009","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWJlZTMyYTktYjA0Mi00ODRiLThkMzQtMmNkM2JmNjI0OTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWJlZTMyYTktYjA0Mi00ODRiLThkMzQtMmNkM2JmNjI0OTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"The compelling story of Michael Peterson, a crime novelist accused of killing wife Kathleen after she is found dead at the bottom of a staircase in their home."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Petit pays
programme.desc: En 1992, à Bujumbura, au Burundi, Gaby et ses amis s'introduisent discrètement dans les jardins de riches propriétaires occidentaux pour récolter des fruits, qu'ils revendent aussitôt à la sauvette aux automobilistes. Mais pour le jeune garçon, ce n'est qu'un jeu. Gaby vit en effet de façon aisée entre sa petite soeur, sa mère rwandaise, Yvonne, et son père Michel Chapaz, un entrepreneur français. Mais cette existence relativement paisible se fissure quand leurs parents se séparent et que des conflits entre Tutsis et Hutus commencent à éclater.

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Nos programmes se terminent pour cette journée, en attendant ceux de demain.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Présenté par le talentueux Jimmy Fallon, The Tonight Show, diffusé d'abord aux Etats-Unis, propose un moment unique : interviews décalées, gags délirants, parodies hilarantes, sketchs mythiques, défis rocambolesques. Une pléiade de stars est invitée chaque soir pour contribuer à ce grand moment de divertissement et d'humour.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Talk-show.

programme.title: Delete Me
programme.desc: Marit est déçue que sa meilleure amie l'ait abandonnée, préférant se rendre à une fête. Fanny, une hackeuse et militante féministe, contacte Marion pour la première fois pour lui annoncer la mauvaise nouvelle : la sextape a été diffusée dans le monde entier par un utilisateur nommé SOFUS. Le monde de Marion est à l'envers.

programme.title: Delete Me
programme.desc: Lorsque Marion se fait insulter par Christian, Marit la défend ardemment, ce qui lui vaudra par la suite d'être expulsée du discobus et laissée seule dans les bois, au milieu de la nuit. Marion, quant à elle, fera le choix de rester à bord du bus. Pendant ce temps, Fanny révèle un secret sur elle-même.

programme.title: Delete Me
programme.desc: Marit s'entraîne sans sa partenaire de nage Marion, qui sans prévenir, ne vient pas à leur entraînement. A la place, elle se rend à une fête et passe le temps avec Christian. La nuit se prolonge : c'est le soir où la sextape est créée..

programme.title: Delete Me
programme.desc: Ce qui s'est passé au bord de la piscine la nuit où la sextape a été créée, est enfin révélé. Marion et Marit sont tombées dans un piège qui s'est progressivement refermé sur elles.

programme.title: Years and Years
programme.desc: Alors qu’il regarde l’entrepreneuse Vivienne Rook faire un scandale en direct à la télévision en 2019, Daniel Lyons est contacté par sa sœur célibataire Rosie sur le point d’accoucher. Il décide de la rejoindre à la maternité en compagnie de son compagnon, Ralph. Après la naissance de son neveu, Daniel évoque ses craintes sur l'avenir de la jeunesse suite aux déclarations de Vivienne Rook sur le conflit israélo-palestinien. Cinq ans plus tard, Daniel, jeune employé de mairie, doit faire face à la crise des réfugiés ukrainiens qui fuient leur pays passé sous contrôle militaire russe.

programme.title: Years and Years
programme.desc: Les tensions entre les Etats-Unis et l’empire du Milieu s’accentuent suite à l’incident survenu sur l’île chinoise de Hong Sha Dao. Chaque membre de la famille Lyons subit indirectement les sanctions économiques imposées aux Etats-Unis par l'ONU. Après avoir perdu son emploi, Céleste, l'épouse de Stephen Lyons, tente de se rapprocher de sa fille Bethany qui s'était éloignée d'elle suite à une querelle. Mais l’attitude de Bethany qui se plonge dans le monde digital la perturbe. Pendant ce temps, Vivienne Rook brigue un poste de députée.

programme.title: Years and Years
programme.desc: En 2026, Vivienne Rook, désormais députée, propose que les citoyens passent un test de QI pour déterminer s’ils sont suffisamment intelligents pour voter. Pendant ce temps, les membres de la famille Lyons subissent les effets de la nouvelle crise financière qui touche l'Angleterre. Après avoir emménagé avec sa femme Céleste et ses deux filles chez sa grand-mère, Stephen trouve un travail en tant que livreur. Rosie Lyons accueille chez elle sa sœur, Edith, de retour en Angleterre. Daniel n’arrive plus à joindre son petit ami Viktor, qui a été expulsé en Ukraine.

programme.title: Years and Years
programme.desc: Daniel prend de nombreux risques pour faire revenir Viktor en Angleterre. De leur côté, Stephen et Céleste cumulent des emplois pour joindre les deux bouts. Mais les époux ne se parlent quasiment plus ! Quant à Rosie, elle décide de se lancer dans une autre expérience professionnelle en faisant l’acquisition d’un food truck avec son compagnon, Jonjo. En parallèle, les chamboulements politiques se multiplient à travers le monde : l'Espagne a un gouvernement d’extrême gauche, la Grèce se retire de la zone euro et les Etats-Unis interdisent le mariage gay.

programme.title: Years and Years
programme.desc: Désormais premier ministre, Vivienne Rook gagne en popularité. Mais plusieurs citoyens s’inquiètent des disparitions des opposants de son nouveau parti, le mouvement quatre étoiles. Pendant ce temps, l’Angleterre fait face à de nombreuses inondations et de fréquentes coupures de courant. Devant l’augmentation de sans-abris à cause des conditions climatiques, Vivienne Rook impose aux citoyens disposant de chambres d’amis d’accueillir des Anglais sans domicile fixe. De son côté la famille Lyons tente de surmonter la récente tragédie qui l’a frappée. Rosie et Jonjo décident de se marier.

programme.title: Years and Years
programme.desc: Depuis la nomination de Vivienne Rook au poste de Premier ministre, la censure frappe les médias anglais qui osent la critiquer, à l’exemple de la BBC, qui cesse d’émettre définitivement. Par ailleurs, cela fait plusieurs mois que Viktor est introuvable. Edith s’inquiète pour son sort et multiplie les efforts pour le retrouver. Elle demande de l’aide à sa nièce Bethany. Mais cette dernière hésite à travailler avec sa tante. Désireuse de faire des économies, Muriel, la grand-mère de la famille Lyons, souhaite vendre la résidence familiale. De son côté, Stephen se rapproche de plus en plus de son ex-femme Celeste.

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Marina ne dissimule plus ses sentiments pour Soraya. Elle tente de lui ouvrir son coeur lors d'une séance de massage. Marc est de plus inquiet. Le jeune célibataire remarque que les candidates encore en lice ne se battent plus pour attirer son attention. En compagnie de Tony Tonic, son coach sportif, Marc organise une épreuve du parcours du combattant pour remotiver les filles.

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Les candidates encore en course dans l'émission vont tenter de se qualifier pour les demi-finales du jeu. Le temps est venu pour Marc de rencontrer les familles des prétendantes. Il sympathise avec le père de Valérie qui lui promet de lui prêter son avion s'il choisit sa fille. De son côté, la mère de Marina ne se montre pas insensible aux charmes du célibataire.

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Marc a passé la nuit avec Anne afin de rendre Marina jalouse. Pour autant, cette dernière n'est pas tout attiré par le jeune homme et continue de lui cacher son attirance pour les femmes. Marc invite Marina a une dégustation de vins régionaux.

programme.title: Alphaville, une étrange aventure de Lemmy Caution
Alphaville: Une étrange aventure de Lemmy Caution
programme.desc: Alphaville, une étrange aventure de Lemmy Caution: Directed by Jean-Luc Godard. With Eddie Constantine, Anna Karina, Akim Tamiroff, Valérie Boisgel. A U.S. secret agent is sent to the distant space city of Alphaville where he must find a missing person and free the city from its tyrannical ruler." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0058898/","name":"Alphaville, une étrange aventure de Lemmy Caution","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg4ODQ4NGMtZDg1My00ZDUxLWJkZjYtOThkNDhhMmFkOGZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM0NzcxMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A U.S. secret agent is sent to the distant space city of Alphaville where he must find a missing person and free the city from its tyrannical ruler.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0058898/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mjs2342"},"dateCreated":"1999-04-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Disturbing reality.","reviewBody":"Complex plot about a secret agent who arrives from the outer space outlands in the capital of a large union of nations which resides in space. The system from the state is under the spell from a large, intelligent computer, alpha 60, which cares about nearly everything. Developed from a scientist (von Braun aka Nosferatu, both are hints to germans, the first to werner von braun, the developer from the apollo moon project, the second from the first dracula movie ever, the german soundless movie: NOSFERATU 1922)he tries to install a system of pure logic and rationalism. But what about emotions? And freedom? No one cares anymore... And then the secret agent comes into town and have to fight against this system. programme.title: Uccellacci e uccellini
Des oiseaux petits et grands
programme.desc:
Uccellacci e uccellini: Directed by Pier Paolo Pasolini. With Totò, Ninetto Davoli, Femi Benussi, Umberto Bevilacqua. Totò and his son Ninetto are drifting on a road in Italy when they meet a speaking crow." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0061132/","name":"Uccellacci e uccellini","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmE1OTYwMmQtOTQxMi00MzViLWFkOTAtMTQ3ZjExZjFiMjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQ5Njc3OTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Totò and his son Ninetto are drifting on a road in Italy when they meet a speaking crow.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0061132/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jotix100"},"dateCreated":"2006-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Birds according to Pasolini","reviewBody":"A picaresque approach by a master of the Italian cinema resulted in this personal and different film by Pier Paolo Pasolini. The director, who wrote and produced this picture, was in great form in this story that is more like a fable, deliciously acted by Toto and Ninetto Davoli, one of the best pairings in Pasolini's movies.

The film is, in many aspects, a road movie. From the beginning, we watch as Toto and Ninetto take to the road in their trip to nowhere, it seems, but a trip which permits Pasolini examine some of the things that obsessed him, mainly his dislike for organized religion, as he perceived it in his country, as it clashed with reality. He takes the life of Saint Francis and the story about his relationship with the birds as the main topic for the movie.

It's hard to add anything else to what already has been said by the valuable contributions to IMDb. This film is one of the most inspired by the director. In it, he doesn't pound on the viewer's head those things that were dear to him. In fact, the film has a whimsical touch as we follow the two travelers, Toto and Ninetto, through rural Italy as a raven keeps telling them stories.

Toto is perfect as the older man who is living in his own world and doesn't see the changes around him. Ninetto Davoli gives a great performance as the happy go lucky son. Their surname, is Innocenti, or Innocent, which in a way, fits their characters rather well.

The black and white cinematography by Mario Bernardo and Tonino Delli Colli works wonders for the film. Ennio Morricone's musical score also enhances all that one sees on the screen. This is a light Passolini, but one that delves deep into the subjects that were so dear to the director's heart.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4569,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1969-12-10","keywords":"crow,hawk,sparrow,italy,class struggle","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0869451/","name":"Totò"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0205793/","name":"Ninetto Davoli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0073031/","name":"Femi Benussi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001596/","name":"Pier Paolo Pasolini"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029259/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001596/","name":"Pier Paolo Pasolini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0274721/","name":"Dante Ferretti"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Il generale Della Rovere
Le général Della Rovere
programme.desc:
Il generale Della Rovere: Directed by Roberto Rossellini. With Vittorio De Sica, Hannes Messemer, Vittorio Caprioli, Nando Angelini. Bardone, a petty con man, is arrested by the Gestapo and coerced into impersonating a partisan leader in order to expose another resistance organizer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0053856/","name":"Il generale Della Rovere","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDQ1MDJjYjUtNjk0Yy00YjRiLThmN2MtZjZkZjE0MTNlOGMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bardone, a petty con man, is arrested by the Gestapo and coerced into impersonating a partisan leader in order to expose another resistance organizer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0053856/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"A very acclaimed movie featuring a top-notch acting by veteran actor/director Vittorio De Sica","reviewBody":"Concerning a WWII marketeer and swindler called Bardone : Vittorio De Sica , he often uses to disguise as an officer to get money from the the families of people put in prison by the Gestapo . Once trapped , the Nazis make a deal with him . Then he is forced by a Nazi Colonel Muller : Hannes Messerner to go undercover in a local jail. To find out who the resistance leader is , he poses as a General called Della Rovere . But when the inmates start looking him for guidance , it leads to tragic consequences . He's a Hero...or a Fake ?

This General Della la Rovere 1969 magnificently played by Vittorio De Sica as a petty con man deals with the fantastic wartime adventures and intrigues of the mountebank who held the fate of the fighting undergroung in his hands . Eventually , our hero finds the line between his assumed character and actual identity diminished , awakening his slumbering conscience, resulting in a dramatic conclusion . It contains an interesting and thought-provoking screenplay from Indro Montanelli , Sergio Amadei , Fabbri and Roberto Rossellini himself . Starring Vittorio De Sica is well accompanied by a good cast , such as : Hannes Messemer , Sandra Milo , Anne Vernon , Vittorio Caprioli , Giovanna Ralli , Franco Interlenghi , Linda Veras, Modugno, Luciano Pigozi or Allan Collins , among others.

There is another inferior version 2011 directed by Carlo Carlei starrred by Pierfrancesco Faviano and Shopov . Il Generale Della Rovere 1959 displays an evocative cinematography in black and white by Carlo Cardini . As well as atmospheric and sensitive musical score by Renzo Rossellini . The motion picture was stunningly directed by Roberto Rosselini . He was a prestigious writer and director, making notorious films, such as : "Paisan" , "The Miracle" , "Amore" , "Stromboli" , "The Flowers of St Francis" , "Europe" , " Voyage in Italy" , "Seven Deadly Sins" , "Blas Pascal", "The Rise of Louis XIV" , "Agustín of Hippo" , "The Messiah" , among others . Rating : 7.5/10. Above average, well worth seeing . Especially recommended for featuring a bravura lead interpretation by veteran Vittorio De Sica .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3117,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","War"],"datePublished":"1959-11-11","keywords":"resistance,nazi,gestapo,swindler,con man","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001120/","name":"Vittorio De Sica"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0582019/","name":"Hannes Messemer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0590452/","name":"Sandra Milo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0744023/","name":"Roberto Rossellini"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040085/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051263/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0024847/","name":"Sergio Amidei"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264420/","name":"Diego Fabbri"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0598975/","name":"Indro Montanelli"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0053856, Title: Il generale Della Rovere, --- Description: Il generale Della Rovere: Directed by Roberto Rossellini. With Vittorio De Sica, Hannes Messemer, Vittorio Caprioli, Nando Angelini. Bardone, a petty con man, is arrested by the Gestapo and coerced into impersonating a partisan leader in order to expose another resistance organizer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0053856/","name":"Il generale Della Rovere","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDQ1MDJjYjUtNjk0Yy00YjRiLThmN2MtZjZkZjE0MTNlOGMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bardone, a petty con man, is arrested by the Gestapo and coerced into impersonating a partisan leader in order to expose another resistance organizer.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0053856/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes","dateCreated":"2021-05-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"A very acclaimed movie featuring a top-notch acting by veteran actor/director Vittorio De Sica","reviewBody":"Concerning a WWII marketeer and swindler called Bardone : Vittorio De Sica , he often uses to disguise as an officer to get money from the the families of people put in prison by the Gestapo . Once trapped , the Nazis make a deal with him . Then he is forced by a Nazi Colonel Muller : Hannes Messerner to go undercover in a local jail. To find out who the resistance leader is , he poses as a General called Della Rovere . But when the inmates start looking him for guidance , it leads to tragic consequences . He's a Hero...or a Fake ?

This General Della la Rovere 1969 magnificently played by Vittorio De Sica as a petty con man deals with the fantastic wartime adventures and intrigues of the mountebank who held the fate of the fighting undergroung in his hands . Eventually , our hero finds the line between his assumed character and actual identity diminished , awakening his slumbering conscience, resulting in a dramatic conclusion . It contains an interesting and thought-provoking screenplay from Indro Montanelli , Sergio Amadei , Fabbri and Roberto Rossellini himself . Starring Vittorio De Sica is well accompanied by a good cast , such as : Hannes Messemer , Sandra Milo , Anne Vernon , Vittorio Caprioli , Giovanna Ralli , Franco Interlenghi , Linda Veras, Modugno, Luciano Pigozi or Allan Collins , among others.

There is another inferior version 2011 directed by Carlo Carlei starrred by Pierfrancesco Faviano and Shopov . Il Generale Della Rovere 1959 displays an evocative cinematography in black and white by Carlo Cardini . As well as atmospheric and sensitive musical score by Renzo Rossellini . The motion picture was stunningly directed by Roberto Rosselini . He was a prestigious writer and director, making notorious films, such as : "Paisan" , "The Miracle" , "Amore" , "Stromboli" , "The Flowers of St Francis" , "Europe" , " Voyage in Italy" , "Seven Deadly Sins" , "Blas Pascal", "The Rise of Louis XIV" , "Agustín of Hippo" , "The Messiah" , among others . Rating : 7.5/10. Above average, well worth seeing . Especially recommended for featuring a bravura lead interpretation by veteran Vittorio De Sica .","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3117,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","War"],"datePublished":"1959-11-11","keywords":"resistance,nazi,gestapo,swindler,con man","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001120/","name":"Vittorio De Sica","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0582019/","name":"Hannes Messemer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0590452/","name":"Sandra Milo"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0744023/","name":"Roberto Rossellini"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040085/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051263/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0024847/","name":"Sergio Amidei","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0264420/","name":"Diego Fabbri","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0598975/","name":"Indro Montanelli"],"duration":"PT2H12M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Voyage sans espoir
Voyage sans espoir
programme.desc:
Voyage sans espoir: Directed by Christian-Jaque. With Simone Renant, Jean Marais, Paul Bernard, Jean Brochard. An escaped convict needing funds for a getaway by sea takes advantage of a prosperous looking young traveler he meets.A nightclub singer involved with them both complicates things." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0240185/","name":"Voyage sans espoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxODA1NDc5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDA0MjgzMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An escaped convict needing funds for a getaway by sea takes advantage of a prosperous looking young traveler he meets.A nightclub singer involved with them both complicates things.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0240185/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dbdumonteil"},"dateCreated":"2008-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Journey to the end of night","reviewBody":"It was 1943 in an occupied France.This desperate movie was probably not made to cheer up French people .Christian-Jaque 's work is noir,noir,noir in every sense of the term.

All the action takes place in darkness ,in a runaway train where two mysterious men meet ,on a boat at the dimming of the day where sinister-looking sailors are waiting for something which could get them out of their dump,in a nightclub where a chanteuse down on her luck takes comfort on the roof of her building by listening to the ships leaving for faraway lands.

This is par excellence Realisme Poetique.Based on a novel by Pierre McOrlan ,who wrote "Quai des Brumes" the movie which virtually invented the genre ,or at least rocketed it to fame.Alain (Jean Marais) wants to sail away and to start all over again in Argentina.The subject of the faraway land is a cliché from those bygone days ,but Christian-Jaque renews it ,and makes "Voyage Sans Espoir" ,some kind of "Quai des Brumes " in reverse.

In the darkest night of a harbor which means danger and death ,the faces are often filmed in close shot,with a ray of light on their eyes. Christian-Jaque makes the best of a hackneyed subject and he is helped by his cast who includes Marais,Simone Renant,Paul Bernard,Louis Salou and Lucien Coédel

There's some racism in the movie though,perhaps a sign of the times (the Occupation):the Asian sailor is the most hateful member of the crew.With his broken French ,he epitomizes evil.A character says something like "that race,you can't trust them..".Later ,in the nightclub where a black dancer is performing ,a guest says "black becomes her,but do not worry,the singer ain't black".Later Christian-Jaque would give the "imagine" equivalent of a movie with " Si Tous Les Gars Du Monde" a hymn to universal fraternity which left no doubt with his ideas.As I said ,it was a sign of the time."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":122,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"1943-12-15","keywords":"singer","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719135/","name":"Simone Renant"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0544786/","name":"Jean Marais"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0076350/","name":"Paul Bernard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0160108/","name":"Christian-Jaque"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010839/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0160108/","name":"Christian-Jaque"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0458283/","name":"Georg C. Klaren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0472016/","name":"Maurice Krol"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Les galettes de Pont-Aven
Les galettes de Pont-Aven
programme.desc: Les galettes de Pont-Aven: Directed by Joël Séria. With Jean-Pierre Marielle, Dolores McDonough, Jeanne Goupil, Claude Piéplu. Henri is a middle-aged travelling umbrella salesman from Saumur who lives a sexless and unhappy married life with his puritan wife and two children. Painting is the only true passion of Henri but he also has an affection for female buttocks. One night, on the roads of Brittany he hits a boar with his car. Émile, a rude and carefree painter who lives in a cottage near Riec-sur-Belon meets him and invites him to stay at his house while the car is being fixed. Henri falls in love with his Canadian live-in girlfriend Angela who draws Henri's attention with her beautiful buttocks. They leave Émile after a violent confrontation and move to Pont-Aven, 'the city of painters'. Angela encourages Henri to continue his life as a painter and he sees this as an opportunity to leave his earlier life behind. However, Angela soon dumps him for Émile and Henri becomes a drunkard, butt of jokes in the town, and a painter unable to sell a single painting. Marie, the teenage maid working at the pension Henri stays, is apparently in love with him but he seems to neglect her because his mind is too occupied with Angela. However, Henri soon faces his true feelings for Marie. He finds pure love and a pair of beautiful buttocks in her and decides to make a new start in his life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0187044/","name":"Les galettes de Pont-Aven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWJlYmFkNWQtZGIwYy00NjFhLTllZmItNGQ1M2YzOTc1M2YyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQzMzQzODY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Henri is a middle-aged travelling umbrella salesman from Saumur who lives a sexless and unhappy married life with his puritan wife and two children. Painting is the only true passion of Henri but he also has an affection for female b","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0187044/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"saussure_ph"},"dateCreated":"2014-06-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fundamentals of sex and art inspiration in the french seventies","reviewBody":"Loosely inspired from the life of french painter Paul Gauguin, Cookies (french title Les Galettes de Pont-Aven, Joël Séria 1975) relates how a salesman of umbrellas (played by the hilarious then-43 year-old Jean-Pierre Marielle) rejects his former life and stern spouse to embark on a painting career. His pursuit of happiness and inspiration is marked out by several mistresses, the physical proximity and intimate smell of whom drive him to bliss — and boozy despair when they disappear. Several episodes reflect the contradictions of the early Giscard-d'Estaing era with witty humor, such as Marielle disguised as a traditional Breton singing a duo in a country show, or Dominique Lavanant as a dialect-speaking prostitute in traditional Brittany outfit. Most of all, many viewers will enjoy the moments when the touch and smell of a good pair of buttocks turn the half-dead Jean-Pierre Marielle into an apoplectic, ecstatic reborn. Many aspect of this enjoyable movie are exemplary of the aftermath of the 1968 movement of 'libération sexuelle' which provided inspiration to french independent movie makers and cartoonists (in particular, those of Marcel Gotlib, Claire Bretecher and Nikita Mandryka). But beware : some scenes of drunkenness are awkward and too long and may make the movie unsuitable for contemporary spectators, particularly those lacking familiarity with the smelly and 'troisième degré' humor of extreme Frenchmen in the seventies.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":825,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1975-08-20","keywords":"umbrella,bare chested male,pont aven,drunkenness,portrait","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0547339/","name":"Jean-Pierre Marielle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0568151/","name":"Dolores McDonough"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0332640/","name":"Jeanne Goupil"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0845386/","name":"Joël Séria"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032155/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068915/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013301/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0845386/","name":"Joël Séria"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Cause toujours... tu m'intéresses
Cause toujours, tu m'intéresses
programme.desc: Cause toujours... tu m'intéresses!: Directed by Édouard Molinaro. With Annie Girardot, Jean-Pierre Marielle, Christian Marquand, Brigitte Roüan. François Perrin is a journalist who reads the news on RTL radio. Alone in life, his only "amusement" is his neighbour from Africa, who makes mildly fun of him from time to time. One evening, François is bored, and decides to call a random telephone number. He gets Christine on the line, a bit of an old school pharmacist, who hesitates to put down the phone, and plays the game of seduction with the charming "Mr X". After a missed appointment, he seeks her company, by pretending he is an important reporter, while he keeps on calling her pretending he is a famous writer, in order to not disappoint her because of his small job. In the mean time, Christine has to sort out her family life, but above all her friends, who are a bit too nosy..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0078947/","name":"Cause toujours... tu m'intéresses!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2ZkN2Q3MTMtODI5Yi00YzQ1LWJlYTYtYzQyMjVmYmUwNmQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5MDE5NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"François Perrin is a journalist who reads the news on RTL radio. Alone in life, his only "amusement" is his neighbour from Africa, who makes mildly fun of him from time to time. One evening, François is bored, and decides to call a r","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0078947/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"searchanddestroy-1"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very amusing comedy and clever too.","reviewBody":"It seems that the other user confounded this movie with another one. Well, he is American after all, maybe he doesn't know all the french films as I do. Anyway he is right when he says this is a good film. The tale of a lonely man who, one day, takes his phone and dials one number by chance. And the number is a lonely wife's too. After several calls they decide at last to meet. And from this point, this movie becomes riveting at the most. Very smart, I would say terrific as a very unusual plot between the two characters - Jean-Pierre Marielle and Annie Girardot - who also give us very gripping sequences. A very freshening film, cooling story I am not used to. Annie Girardot and Marielle at their very best. IMDb data; ttnr: 0078947, Title: Cause toujours... tu m'intéresses, --- Description: Cause toujours... tu m'intéresses!: Directed by Édouard Molinaro. With Annie Girardot, Jean-Pierre Marielle, Christian Marquand, Brigitte Roüan. François Perrin is a journalist who reads the news on RTL radio. Alone in life, his only "amusement" is his neighbour from Africa, who makes mildly fun of him from time to time. One evening, François is bored, and decides to call a random telephone number. He gets Christine on the line, a bit of an old school pharmacist, who hesitates to put down the phone, and plays the game of seduction with the charming "Mr X". After a missed appointment, he seeks her company, by pretending he is an important reporter, while he keeps on calling her pretending he is a famous writer, in order to not disappoint her because of his small job. In the mean time, Christine has to sort out her family life, but above all her friends, who are a bit too nosy..." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0078947/","name":"Cause toujours... tu m'intéresses!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2ZkN2Q3MTMtODI5Yi00YzQ1LWJlYTYtYzQyMjVmYmUwNmQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5MDE5NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"François Perrin is a journalist who reads the news on RTL radio. Well, he is American after all, maybe he doesn't know all the french films as I do. Anyway he is right when he says this is a good film. The tale of a lonely man who, one day, takes his phone and dials one number by chance. And the number is a lonely wife's too. After several calls they decide at last to meet. And from this point, this movie becomes riveting at the most. Very smart, I would say terrific as a very unusual plot between the two characters - Jean-Pierre Marielle and Annie Girardot - who also give us very gripping sequences. programme.title: Citizen Kane
Citizen Kane
programme.desc:
Citizen Kane: Directed by Orson Welles. With Joseph Cotten, Dorothy Comingore, Agnes Moorehead, Ruth Warrick. Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0033467/","name":"Citizen Kane","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjBiOTYxZWItMzdiZi00NjlkLWIzZTYtYmFhZjhiMTljOTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0033467/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gobosox"},"dateCreated":"2004-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"See it for what it is","reviewBody":"OK look, let me settle something between those who love and hate this film. A lot of people hail this film because it is technically brilliant and ground breaking. Director Orson Welles did a lot of things visually that no one had ever done before. Nearly every film maker was in some way influenced by this movie. This movie also had a great impact in its time. The title character was based on media giant William Randolph Hearst. He was that generations Donald Trump. He opposed this film so much he did everything in its power to stop its release and almost succeeded. Lastly this film contains some of the strongest and most common themes in literature; Life versus death. It is for these reasons why this film is so revered.

On the contrary people who hate this film mainly complain that it is boring. Which is a legitimate complaint. The story is slow compared to today's standards, and there is no real Hearst character alive today in which to relate. So yes, the story on the surface is outdated. However, this does not make it a bad movie. It was not made as a Matrix/Star Wars type of movie which can be enjoyed even at surface level. This is not pure entertainment. Remember there is more to film than storytelling. This film was designed to be cinematically beautiful and to tell a basic story of love and redemption. There is much more to the story than the thinly veiled attack on Hearst, one just needs to look deeper. Look at Shakespeare or Hawthorne for example, their literary works are universally loved. Yet, many people blow them off because they refuse to look past the outdated language into the beautiful prose and simple ubiquitous themes. Just because something is outdated does not mean it lacks worth in today's world.

My advice to those who did not like it the first time or have not seen it yet is simple. Watch it again for what it is. Do not expect to be on the edge of your seat for two hours. Watch it for the cinematography that alone makes this film among the best (I don't agree with AFI's number one ranking but I think it still ranks high). Look deeper into the story and try to connect with it on some level. At the very least appreciate how influential this film was and where the industry would be without it. If you can do this, then maybe some of the naysayers will change their minds. Again, you do not have to love Citizen Kane, but at least respect it for what it is.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":423550,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1941-09-05","keywords":"newspaper publisher,rosebud,new york,narcissism,materialism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Citizen Kane: Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi568630553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NDczMzc0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDAyNTkyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NDczMzc0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDAyNTkyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the trailer for the Orson Welles classic Citizen Kane. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000080/","name":"Orson Welles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001072/","name":"Joseph Cotten"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0173827/","name":"Dorothy Comingore"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000080/","name":"Orson Welles"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041421/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003016/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0542534/","name":"Herman J. Mankiewicz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000080/","name":"Orson Welles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002144/","name":"John Houseman"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Alphaville, une étrange aventure de Lemmy Caution: Directed by Jean-Luc Godard. With Eddie Constantine, Anna Karina, Akim Tamiroff, Valérie Boisgel. A U.S. secret agent is sent to the distant space city of Alphaville where he must find a missing person and free the city from its tyrannical ruler." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0058898/","name":"Alphaville, une étrange aventure de Lemmy Caution","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDg4ODQ4NGMtZDg1My00ZDUxLWJkZjYtOThkNDhhMmFkOGZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM0NzcxMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A U.S. secret agent is sent to the distant space city of Alphaville where he must find a missing person and free the city from its tyrannical ruler.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0058898/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mjs2342"},"dateCreated":"1999-04-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Disturbing reality.","reviewBody":"Complex plot about a secret agent who arrives from the outer space outlands in the capital of a large union of nations which resides in space. The people in this capital are acting very crazy. They are token under tranquillizers the whole time and even don't know anymore what love is. The system from the state is under the spell from a large, intelligent computer, alpha 60, which cares about nearly everything. Developed from a scientist (von Braun aka Nosferatu, both are hints to germans, the first to werner von braun, the developer from the apollo moon project, the second from the first dracula movie ever, the german soundless movie: NOSFERATU 1922)he tries to install a system of pure logic and rationalism. But what about emotions? And freedom? No one cares anymore... And then the secret agent comes into town and have to fight against this system. Goddard shows nearly no special effects and has made his movie in Paris in the sixties, which is a good trick (except that it is cheap!), because it says that this system is not far away from our reality.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24242,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1965-05-05","keywords":"dystopia,french new wave,surrealism,neo noir,absurdism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Re-release Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3048975129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4ODI4OTU4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzg3NTk5MDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4ODI4OTU4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzg3NTk5MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A U.S. secret agent is sent to the distant space city of Alphaville where he must find a missing person and free the city from its tyrannical ruler."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176061/","name":"Eddie Constantine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0439344/","name":"Anna Karina"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0848667/","name":"Akim Tamiroff"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000419/","name":"Jean-Luc Godard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0652887/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007019/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007978/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000419/","name":"Jean-Luc Godard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0959908/","name":"Paul Éluard"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Le trou
Le trou
programme.desc:
Le trou: Directed by Jacques Becker. With Michel Constantin, Jean Keraudy, Philippe Leroy, Raymond Meunier. Distrust and uncertainty arise when four long-term inmates cautiously induct a new prisoner into their elaborate prison-break scheme." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0054407/","name":"Le trou","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzg1ZWQxZDMtYjBhMC00OTNhLWJiNGYtMGFiNDQ4NzQ4NjVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA1NjYyMDk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Distrust and uncertainty arise when four long-term inmates cautiously induct a new prisoner into their elaborate prison-break scheme.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0054407/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Myshkin_Karamazov"},"dateCreated":"2008-06-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Becker's Swan Song: Too Good To Be Just Another Prison Movie","reviewBody":"Jacques Becker's swan song is a real gem of a film. Le Trou has such an amazing kinetic rhythm to it that one both feels and forgets the claustrophobic environs. Based on a real story turned into a novel by one of the "escapees", the film has excellent casting, wonderful (candel-lit!) cinematography and crisp dialog among its other advantages.

The director was terminally ill during the shoot and was to die after making the final cut. Watching this classic now some four decades since auteur's death, one can only wonder what an artist it would take to demand and achieve such breathtaking perfection in art while combating death at the same time.

Do not let yourself be put off by "yet another prison-movie!" talk. It is too good to be just that. So much so that it could merit comparison with Bresson's "A Man Escaped". Le Trou has such an amazing kinetic rhythm to it that one both feels and forgets the claustrophobic environs. Based on a real story turned into a novel by one of the "escapees", the film has excellent casting, wonderful (candel-lit!) cinematography and crisp dialog among its other advantages.

The director was terminally ill during the shoot and was to die after making the final cut. Watching this classic now some four decades since auteur's death, one can only wonder what an artist it would take to demand and achieve such breathtaking perfection in art while combating death at the same time.
