programme.title: Vivre sans eux
Vivre sans eux
programme.desc:
Vivre sans eux: Directed by Jacques Maillot. With Bernard Le Coq, Esther Garrel, Grégory Montel, Loïc Guingand. Martin is 60. Adèle is 25. He is unhealthy, grumpy and shy. She is cheeky, brazen and provocative. He is looking for his son, she is looking for her father. The two missing persons were living together as a couple, and when Martin and Adèle call at their old address, the new occupant tells them they have moved abroad." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12106304/","name":"Vivre sans eux","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjg4ZTc0NTYtNGMxNS00ZTFmLTkwMzMtOGQzODQ4MmYyZTliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTExNzIzNjg4._V1_.jpg","description":"Martin is 60. Adèle is 25. He is unhealthy, grumpy and shy. She is cheeky, brazen and provocative. He is looking for his son, she is looking for her father. The two missing persons were living together as a couple, and when Martin an","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12106304/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rajdoctor"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"LIVING WITHOUT THEM","reviewBody":"Vivre Sans Eux

I saw this French drama VIVRE SANS EUX inspired from a True Story

A remorse father Martin (Bernand Le Coq) comes to meet his gay son at a mansion where he meets the new occupant Oliver (Gregory Montel). Martin becomes suspicious and spies on Oliver, leading him to meet Adele (Esther Garrel) who has come to meet her gay father - partner of Martin's son. Both start on an odd note but develop an endearing bond for the same purpose of finding their LOVED ones.

One thing leads to another, to reveal the suspense.

The script is very well written by Jean Luc Estebe with unusual plot twists and turns incorporated with relevant flashback stories of Martin and Adele.

Director Jacques Millot maintains a realistic look -unfolding complex human interactions and developing relationships between different characters while maintaining a countryside feel to the narrative.

The casting too is apt - Bernand as a remorseful father and Adele as a strong-willed, opinionated straight-talk daughter portray their characters with much ease. Gregory Montel's character is unlike what he has portrayed till date in his previous movies and he too does gritting justice to his role.

The good thing of the movie is that it does not fall into a typical cliche' sequence of events that we see in a psychological mystery-suspense thriller.

The movie had a good run in various European country telecast,

I would go with 6.75 out of 10 for this Italian production","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":90,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2020-04-08","keywords":"based on true story","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0494204/","name":"Bernard Le Coq"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1081257/","name":"Esther Garrel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2771436/","name":"Grégory Montel"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0537626/","name":"Jacques Maillot"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0125554/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0210887/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0627173/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261548/","name":"Jean-Luc Estèbe"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Le premier jour du reste de ta vie
Le premier jour du reste de ta vie
programme.desc:
Le premier jour du reste de ta vie: Directed by Rémi Bezançon. With Jacques Gamblin, Zabou Breitman, Déborah François, Marc-André Grondin. Five key days in a family's life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0926759/","name":"Le premier jour du reste de ta vie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjc3MzI4OTMtMWZjMS00YTkyLThmMDAtMTJhYzViMDk4MmI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjcyNjE2OTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Five key days in a family's life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0926759/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"theycallmemrglass"},"dateCreated":"2009-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well structured and entertaining drama with a superb soundtrack","reviewBody":"Watched this at a London preview screening

This was a cleverly structured drama depicting a lengthy span of a family's life by rolling the events of one day in each phase of their lives. Its so well done that you really care about how their lives pan out. I felt it conveyed a message that life is too short to waste, so make the most of it. Bizarrely though, there's one message that seems rather twisted, you can only really enjoy yourself if you smoke something with a bit of kick in it! OK..I'll go try that...

How their lives pan out can be a tad predictable because this has been done before. But this movie rolls with so much panache, drama, nostalgia, a superb soundtrack, and lots of humour. In fact I laughed out loud a few times. The performances are uniformly excellent, especially the actor playing the father. He doesn't say much but you can read so much in his subtle expressions.

I think this is a film that has got such a universal appeal which most people can relate to in some way. Its highly entertaining and very well paced.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9412,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-07-23","keywords":"france,1980s,1990s,2000s,year 1988","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1947909401","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI3MzMyNTAtNzY1ZC00MzMzLWEwMWEtZDUzN2RmYzFkODAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGI3MzMyNTAtNzY1ZC00MzMzLWEwMWEtZDUzN2RmYzFkODAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0303826/","name":"Jacques Gamblin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0951456/","name":"Zabou Breitman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1918862/","name":"Déborah François"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1462495/","name":"Rémi Bezançon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032439/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1462495/","name":"Rémi Bezançon"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: It's a Free World..
It's a Free World...
programme.desc:
It's a Free World...: Directed by Ken Loach. With Kierston Wareing, Juliet Ellis, Leslaw Zurek, Joe Siffleet. After being fired from her job, Angie teams up with her flatmate to find employment for immigrants." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0807054/","name":"It's a Free World...","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzMjY3MjQzMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjkwMjU1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After being fired from her job, Angie teams up with her flatmate to find employment for immigrants.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0807054/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bob the moo"},"dateCreated":"2007-12-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not perfect but relevant, topical and convincing","reviewBody":"Fired from her job in a recruitment agency due to a public outburst while recruiting in Poland, Angie decides to set up an agency with flatmate Rose. Undercutting other agencies and working out the back garden of their local pub, Angie builds up business, mainly off the back of a large construction job that she supplies immigrant workers to. Paying cash, below minimum wage and irregularly, Angie and Rose start to build up a little nest egg at the expense of their "workforce" but how sustainable is a business built on exploitation?

It is no surprise that as I watched this film the UK was in the midst of an immigration "debate" (and by "debate" I mean "tabloid-led fuss") because we always seem to be in the middle of a fuss on the subject. So no prizes to Loach for being topical but prizes should go to the film because it is a worthy subject and a solid film. The story is mostly very convincing as it focuses on the daily business of making money with cheap temporary labour and the reality of life in that world. As such it is effortlessly engaging and benefits from us being more or less on the side of the main character Angie, who is only doing what everyone else is doing  screwing down labour costs to maximise profit. From this point we start to get more and more into this world and find it to be just as terrible and exploitative as one would imagine, with blowback on everyone. The need for a narrative flow to the film ultimately means that it does exaggerate at some points to increase drama but mostly it works even if it far from uplifting stuff.

Of course those coming to a Ken Loach film cannot really claim to be surprised by this approach and nor should they be. His direction is excellent and he uses the streets, alleys and dingy flats of this world really well to keep true to the convincing dialogue from Laverty and the cast. I say the cast because I cannot imagine that it was this real on paper without the delivery. Wareing is wonderfully cast and she is instantly recognisable to anyone who knows the "cheeky sexy woman" who work as reps etc in the "real world". She works well alongside an equally good Ellis, who is less showy but no less real. Below them the cast are very convincing and I didn't see anyone "acting" at any point. This makes it easier to take all round because it mostly feels like we are just watching and not having Loach push our face into it.

As depressing and hopeless as this approach makes the subject, I did not feel it was anything other than fair. We all know that the world is built on money and that if it can be done cheaper, someone will try and do so regardless of the non-financial costs. This film paints a convincing picture that mostly avoids preaching and, aside from the dramatics towards the back end, it uses Angie as our eyes into a world that is exploiting, heartless and desperate. Not perfect but it is relevant and an important part of the debate on the real costs of immigration and capitalism."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5926,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-09-28","keywords":"van,ford,ford transit,honda,immigrant","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1663573/","name":"Kierston Wareing"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254927/","name":"Juliet Ellis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2022053/","name":"Leslaw Zurek"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0516360/","name":"Ken Loach"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059152/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323374/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491956/","name":"Paul Laverty"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0807054, Title: It's a Free World.., --- Description: It's a Free World...: Directed by Ken Loach. With Kierston Wareing, Juliet Ellis, Leslaw Zurek, Joe Siffleet. After being fired from her job, Angie teams up with her flatmate to find employment for immigrants." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0807054/","name":"It's a Free World...","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzMjY3MjQzMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjkwMjU1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"After being fired from her job, Angie teams up with her flatmate to find employment for immigrants.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0807054/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"bob the moo","dateCreated":"2007-12-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not perfect but relevant, topical and convincing","reviewBody":"Fired from her job in a recruitment agency due to a public outburst while recruiting in Poland, Angie decides to set up an agency with flatmate Rose. Undercutting other agencies and working out the back garden of their local pub, Angie builds up business, mainly off the back of a large construction job that she supplies immigrant workers to. Paying cash, below minimum wage and irregularly, Angie and Rose start to build up a little nest egg at the expense of their "workforce" but how sustainable is a business built on exploitation?

It is no surprise that as I watched this film the UK was in the midst of an immigration "debate" (and by "debate" I mean "tabloid-led fuss") because we always seem to be in the middle of a fuss on the subject. So no prizes to Loach for being topical but prizes should go to the film because it is a worthy subject and a solid film. The story is mostly very convincing as it focuses on the daily business of making money with cheap temporary labour and the reality of life in that world. As such it is effortlessly engaging and benefits from us being more or less on the side of the main character Angie, who is only doing what everyone else is doing  screwing down labour costs to maximise profit. From this point we start to get more and more into this world and find it to be just as terrible and exploitative as one would imagine, with blowback on everyone. The need for a narrative flow to the film ultimately means that it does exaggerate at some points to increase drama but mostly it works even if it far from uplifting stuff.

Of course those coming to a Ken Loach film cannot really claim to be surprised by this approach and nor should they be. His direction is excellent and he uses the streets, alleys and dingy flats of this world really well to keep true to the convincing dialogue from Laverty and the cast. I say the cast because I cannot imagine that it was this real on paper without the delivery. Wareing is wonderfully cast and she is instantly recognisable to anyone who knows the "cheeky sexy woman" who work as reps etc in the "real world". She works well alongside an equally good Ellis, who is less showy but no less real. Below them the cast are very convincing and I didn't see anyone "acting" at any point. This makes it easier to take all round because it mostly feels like we are just watching and not having Loach push our face into it.

As depressing and hopeless as this approach makes the subject, I did not feel it was anything other than fair. We all know that the world is built on money and that if it can be done cheaper, someone will try and do so regardless of the non-financial costs. This film paints a convincing picture that mostly avoids preaching and, aside from the dramatics towards the back end, it uses Angie as our eyes into a world that is exploiting, heartless and desperate. Not perfect but it is relevant and an important part of the debate on the real costs of immigration and capitalism.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5926,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-09-28","keywords":"van,ford,ford transit,honda,immigrant","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1663573/","name":"Kierston Wareing","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254927/","name":"Juliet Ellis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2022053/","name":"Leslaw Zurek"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0516360/","name":"Ken Loach"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059152/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008399/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323374/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491956/","name":"Paul Laverty"],"duration":"PT1H36M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ceux qui travaillent
programme.desc: Frank, cadre supérieur dans une compagnie de fret maritime, est toujours le premier arrivé et le dernier parti à son travail. Sans avoir fait d'études mais à force de ténacité, il est parvenu à obtenir ce poste. Un jour, afin d'éviter de fortes pénalités à son entreprise, il se prend de franchir la ligne jaune en donnant un pot de vin à un capitaine de navire incompétent. La direction l'apprend et le licencie. Après un rendez-vous piège avec une entreprise concurrente, il a beaucoup de mal à retrouver un poste. Un ami finit par lui proposer un emploi où sa morale est mise à l'épreuve.

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: En décembre 1992, Mona Juul, employée au ministère des affaires étrangères norvégiennes, et son mari Terje Rod-Larsen, directeur du think tank Fafo, constatent les échecs successifs des négociation menées par des officiels israéliens et palestiniens pour trouver un accord de paix. Devant la lourdeurs des dispositifs officiel, le couple décide d'organiser une rencontre clandestine entre représentants des deux camps. Alors que Terje est au Moyen-Orient pour parler avec Yossi Beilin, ministre des affaires étrangères israélien, Mona se rend à Londres pour rencontrer Ahmed Qurei, ministre des finances de l'OLP.

programme.title: Ma bataille
programme.desc: Tristan s'est échappé de l'asile psychiatrique. Dans la rue, il aborde un passant ignorant tout de sa condition et lui affirme qu'il est le véritable père de sa fille. Contre toute attente, l'inconnu croit au récit de Tristan. Ne serait-il pas plus fou que son interlocuteur ? Le dernier court métrage ubuesque des réalisateurs Hugo Benamozig et David Caviglioli, qui ont signé depuis leur premier long, "Terrible jungle", avec Catherine Deneuve.

programme.title: Spaceship Earth
programme.desc: L'histoire vraie de "Biosphere 2", la gigantesque réplique de l'écosystème terrestre, construite en 1991, et dans laquelle huit scientifiques se sont isolés pendant deux ans.

programme.title: The Peanut Butter Falcon
Le cri du faucon
programme.desc:
The Peanut Butter Falcon: Directed by Tyler Nilson, Michael Schwartz. With Zack Gottsagen, Ann Owens, Dakota Johnson, Bruce Dern. Zak runs away from his care home to make his dream of becoming a wrestler come true." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4364194/","name":"The Peanut Butter Falcon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWVmZGQ0MGYtMDI1Yy00MDkxLWJiYjQtMmZjZmQ0NDFmMDRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg3MDMxNzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Zak runs away from his care home to make his dream of becoming a wrestler come true.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4364194/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"NolanChaloupka_OnceUponAMoviePod"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"A sweet film!","reviewBody":"We finally got The Peanut Butter Falcon playing in my town so naturally I was first in line to see it. After hearing all the hype from this film it's safe to say I was ecstatic to see it. After the film ended I had a great time, but I felt it was a bit overhyped.

First of all the pros of this film, Shia LeBeouff and Dakota Johnson give a great performance with a fun story that kept a smile on my face throughout the film. I also felt the film looked fantastic. The cinematography was gritty, real and did a great job of capturing the swampy area of the North Carolina Outer Banks.

As for cons I felt that there were some scenes that didn't really work for me. They seemed a little pretentious or out of left field. And I don't know if I really buy the ending of the film. It seemed a little far fetched for my tastes.

However, I love this film. Looking at it from a critics standpoint it has some issues, but looking at it from a movie viewer it's a great time! I plan to watch this again as soon as it comes out. If this film is playing in your town go check it out!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":82757,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-08-23","keywords":"down syndrome,wrestling,friendship,bare chested male,loss of loved one","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Now Playing !?!?! programme.title: Les neiges du Kilimandjaro
Les neiges du Kilimandjaro
programme.desc:
Les neiges du Kilimandjaro: Directed by Robert Guédiguian. With Ariane Ascaride, Jean-Pierre Darroussin, Gérard Meylan, Grégoire Leprince-Ringuet. A union pensioner and his wife are robbed, but find that merely getting the assailants brought to justice is not enough for their consciences." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1852006/","name":"Les neiges du Kilimandjaro","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyNzU3MDQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk1NzY0MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A union pensioner and his wife are robbed, but find that merely getting the assailants brought to justice is not enough for their consciences.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1852006/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"marcoaponte"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"After a traumatic experience in their home, a trade unionist and his wife question the turn their lives have taken","reviewBody":"After a traumatic incident in their home, we see a trade unionist and his wife, hard-core socialists, questioning the turn their lives have taken over the years, too comfortable, too middle-class. Have we become like those rich people we used to fight? they wonder. Set in Marseilles, this story is compelling, cleverly structured, and very moving. Performances are outstanding, particularly from the two leads: Ariane Ascaride as Marie Claire and Jean Pierre Darrousin as Michel. They wonder about the choices they made, the confront their own children, and they make new choices trying to recover their lost passion for equality and class struggle. Photography is beautiful and includes several shots of the Marseille Harbour. I saw this film on Saturday 15 September 2012 at the Prince Charles in London as part of the London Labour Film Festival.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3816,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-11-16","keywords":"2000s,marseilles france,title based on song,title appears in song,nostalgia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Exctract 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3100683545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NDM3MzMzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjIxNjY2MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NDM3MzMzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjIxNjY2MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Despite losing his job, Michel lives happily with Marie-Claire. They have been in love for more than thirty years Â… Their children and grandchildren delight themÂ… They have plenty of close friendsÂ… They are proud of their union and political strugglesÂ… Their conscience is as clear as their view of life.
This happiness will be shattered along with their French window by two young men, armed and masked, who beat them, tie them up, snatch their wedding rings and flee with their credit cardsÂ…
The shock will be all the more violent when they discover that this brutal attack was organized by one of the young workers laid off at the same time as Michel, by one of their own people.
Michel and Marie-Claire gradually discover that their attacker, Christophe, only did what he did because he had no choice. He lives alone with his two younger brothers and takes very good care of them, keeping a close eye on their education and their healthÂ…
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0038449/","name":"Ariane Ascaride"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0201669/","name":"Jean-Pierre Darroussin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0583681/","name":"Gérard Meylan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350168/","name":"Robert Guédiguian"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093409/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044140/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350168/","name":"Robert Guédiguian"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0401076/","name":"Victor Hugo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0587271/","name":"Jean-Louis Milesi"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Le promeneur du Champ de Mars
programme.desc: En 1994, alors qu'il achève son second mandat et lutte contre un cancer, le président accepte de se confier à Antoine Moreau, un jeune journaliste qui souhaite écrire un livre sur lui. Délaissant quelque peu sa compagne Jeanne, Antoine passe des nuits entières à croiser ses sources. Il interroge le Président sur sa jeunesse. Mais ce dernier élude adroitement les questions gênantes.

programme.title: Court central
programme.desc: Court Central est honoré d'accueillir Zita Hanrot, comédienne césarisée. Elle a reçu le César du meilleur espoir féminin en 2016 pour son rôle dans "Fatima". Dans le cadre de l'ADAMI Zita passe derrière la caméra pour la première fois et réalise "La maman des poissons".

programme.title: L'heure zéro
programme.desc: Guillaume Neuville impose à sa seconde épouse Caroline un bref séjour en Bretagne dans le splendide manoir de la Pointe-aux-Mouettes de sa tante Camilla, une veuve aussi riche que charmante. Caroline est mécontente car Guillaume a eu l'idée de la réunir avec son ex-femme, Aude. Un matin, Camilla est retrouvée morte dans son lit, la tête ensanglantée. L'enquête est confiée au commissaire Martin Bataille.

programme.title: Malgré elles
programme.desc: Téléfilm historique.

programme.title: Un homme au pair
programme.desc: Téléfilm humoristique.

programme.title: Irresponsable
programme.sub-title: S2 E6 Les mystères du sexe

programme.title: Irresponsable
programme.sub-title: S2 E7 Boules puantes et sentiments

programme.title: Les hommes du feu
programme.desc: Dans une caserne de pompiers du Sud de la France, Philippe, le capitaine, envoie ses hommes à la poursuite de faux pompiers qui effectuent des collectes d'argent frauduleuses auprès des riverains. Peu de temps après, la vie, très masculine, de la caserne est transformée par l'arrivée de Bénédicte Meursault, adjudante-chef. Xavier, qui le même grade qu'elle, se pose des questions sur son statut auprès de Philippe. Dès sa première nuit de garde, Bénédicte, accompagnée de Xavier, intervient, par une forte pluie, sur un accident de la route.Découvrez les coulisses de ce film, tourné dans une vraie caserne de pompiers.

programme.title: Court central
programme.desc: Court Central est honoré d'accueillir Zita Hanrot, comédienne césarisée. Elle a reçu le César du meilleur espoir féminin en 2016 pour son rôle dans "Fatima". Dans le cadre de l'ADAMI Zita passe derrière la caméra pour la première fois et réalise "La maman des poissons".

programme.title: Sorry to Bother You
programme.desc: A San Francisco, Cassius Green fait tout pour obtenir un modeste emploi dans une entreprise de télémarketing. L'homme, qui ne parvient plus à régler le loyer du garage que lui loue son oncle, voit ce nouveau poste comme une bénédiction. Mais bien qu'il suive à la lettre le script fourni par ses employeurs, Cassius ne parvient pas à vendre d'encyclopédies à ses interlocuteurs téléphoniques. Sur les conseils de Langston, un vétéran, Cassius, qui est Noir, commence à prendre une voix de Blanc. Le succès est immédiat.

programme.title: Anomalisa
programme.desc: Michael Stone, auteur anglais, arrive en avion à Cincinnati pour donner une conférence sur son dernier ouvrage, «Comment puis-je vous aider à les aider». En vol, il se souvient de la lettre pleine de ressentiment que sa petite amie Bella lui avait envoyé, juste après leur rupture onze ans plus tôt. Arrivé à l'hôtel, alors que le souvenir de Bella le hante, il décide de l'appeler. Son ancienne compagne accepte de le retrouver mais leur dîner ne se passe pas vraiment comme Michael l'aurait cru.

programme.title: Wildlife : une saison ardente
programme.desc: American drama revolves around Jeannette and Jerry Brinson who have recently moved to Great Falls, Montana with their teenage son Joe. Jerry loses his job. He sees the local firefighting efforts against a forest fire raging in nearby mountains and decides to join the cause of fighting the fire. He has to leave his wife and son. Jeannette is upset and Joe is worried. Jeannette speaks openly about her challenging marriage to Joe, and Joe's school life is affected by the stress as he witnesses his mother's struggle as she faces up to difficulties. While Jerry is away, Jeannette becomes romantically involved with Warren Miller, a prosperous older man. This is the beginning of the end for her marriage.

programme.title: Puzzle
programme.desc: Dans le New Jersey, l'existence vie d'Agnes, mariée à Louie, un homme simple et pieux, et mère de deux grands garçons, est un peu trop réglée. Celle-ci est prend un autre tour quand, pour son anniversaire, elle reçoit un smartphone, qui ne l'intéresse guère, mais surtout un puzzle de 1000 pièces, représentant la carte du monde. Agnes se rend compte qu'elle termine assez rapidement le jeu pourtant assez difficile et décide de se rendre à New York, dans une boutique spécialisée, pour en acheter un autre.

programme.title: Love and Friendship
programme.desc: A la fin du XVIIIe siècle, en Angleterre, lady Susan Vernon, veuve depuis peu, rend visite à sa belle soeur, Catherine DeCourcy Vernon. Susan, qui tient a ne pas perdre son rang, est connue pour être une belle mais dangereuse manipulatrice. Alors que son séjour chez sa belle soeur, à Churchill, est censé calmer les rumeurs à son sujet, elle fait la connaissance de Reginald, le frère de Catherine, qui tombe aussitôt sous son charme. Peu de temps après, Frederica, la fille de Susan, arrive sur place, avec à ses trousses sir James Martin, à qui lady Vernon rêve de la marier.

programme.title: Séjour dans les monts Fuchun
programme.desc: La famille Gu est réunie dans un grand restaurant la ville-district de Fuyang, où travaille l'un de ses membres pour célébrer les 70 ans de la matriarche du clan. Mère de quatre fils, qui pour certains ont également fondé des familles, elle retrouve avec joie ses enfants et ses petits enfants. Mais la soirée est marquée par un premier incident, mineur, une panne d'électricité, avant de s'achever inopinément sur une note plus inquiétante : la matriarche est victime d'un évanouissement. Les médecins qui s'occupent d'elle diagnostiquent alors un début de démence.

programme.title: Acusada
programme.desc: En Argentine, Dolores Dreier, une étudiante vivant dans un milieu aisé, est sous le feu des média depuis plusieurs mois. Entourée et protégée par ses parents, la jeune femme accepte des interviews au cours desquelles elle évoque sa relation avec sa meilleure amie Camila Nieves, retrouvée assassinée deux ans et demie plus tôt. Alors que le procès doit débuter dans trois semaines, Dolores, principale suspecte du meurtre par la police, prépare minutieusement sa défense avec son avocat et sa famille.

programme.title: Succession
Succession
programme.desc: Succession: Created by Jesse Armstrong. With Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox, Kieran Culkin. The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7660850/","name":"Succession","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDE0ODVlYjktNjJiMC00ODk4LWIwNTktMWRhZmZiOGFhYmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7660850/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jeroen-106"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"I don't understand the negativity.","reviewBody":"Characters are actually not one-dimensional as some people state here. Everyone is imperfect in this show. And even if they all seem greedy, they all have their weaknesses and their motivation is rooted deep in their personalities. For example the son who is temp CEO only wants his father's approval and pride, but gets rejected time after time. He plays the character very well. It's a healthy dose of drama and humor. I'm not sure yet about The Office - ish camerawork (sudden zooms) because it gives the impression of a mockumentary, as if the cameraman is there and just recording what is happening in real-time. It clashes a bit with the overall style of the show. Same for some of The Office style humor they brought to this show. But these are minor things that don't get in the way of the story.\n\nDefinitely recommended. IMDb data; ttnr: 7660850, Title: Succession, --- Description: Succession: Created by Jesse Armstrong. With Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox, Kieran Culkin. The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7660850/","name":"Succession","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDE0ODVlYjktNjJiMC00ODk4LWIwNTktMWRhZmZiOGFhYmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7660850/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jeroen-106","dateCreated":"2018-06-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"I don't understand the negativity.","reviewBody":"Characters are actually not one-dimensional as some people state here. Everyone is imperfect in this show. And even if they all seem greedy, they all have their weaknesses and their motivation is rooted deep in their personalities. For example the son who is temp CEO only wants his father's approval and pride, but gets rejected time after time. He plays the character very well. It's a healthy dose of drama and humor. I'm not sure yet about The Office - ish camerawork (sudden zooms) because it gives the impression of a mockumentary, as if the cameraman is there and just recording what is happening in real-time. It clashes a bit with the overall style of the show. Same for some of The Office style humor they brought to this show. But these are minor things that don't get in the way of the story.\n\nDefinitely recommended. Give it a few episodes!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":65778,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"media empire,patriarchy,wealth,dysfunctional family,business","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007814/","name":"Hiam Abbass","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1002609/","name":"Nicholas Braun","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0702468/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770923/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104036/","name":"Jesse Armstrong"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3233792793","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season two, Logan Roy begins Season three in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances. credits.actor: Claudia Tagbo, Rebecca Azan, Philippe Magnan, Marisa Berenson

programme.title: Burden
programme.desc: Au printemps 1966, à Laurens, une ville pauvre de Caroline du Sud, Mike Burden gagne modestement sa vie en effectuant des saisies pour le compte de Tom Griffin, véritable figure paternelle, chez des mauvais payeurs. C'est au cours d'une de ses missions qu'il fait la connaissance de Judy, mère divorcée d'un garçon, à laquelle il s'attache immédiatement. Mais ce que Judy ignore, c'est que Mike, Tom et leurs amis, racistes, viennent de prendre possession d'un cinéma désaffecté pour le transformer en musée glorifiant les actions passée du Klu Klux Klan. Le révérend Kenndy, qui tente d'apaiser les tensions entre les communautés, est consterné par cette nouvelle.

He sets out to give her an entire life in the last year she has left." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6598238/","name":"Life in a Year","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTNiY2Y4MjMtM2MyMi00ODYxLTk4N2MtNjhkYjVkODFjNmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDg0MDgxNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The movie follows 17-year-old Daryn who finds out that his girlfriend is dying. He sets out to give her an entire life in the last year she has left.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6598238/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"spencerthetracy"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A slightly refreshing experience","reviewBody":"I watched it last night. Its certainly obvious that the young Smith is growing up. He places a smile on many faces with his earnest effort. The performances of the leads are believable but there was very little chemistry between the two. He played a likeable and intelligent character and he pulls it off quite well. Cara also pulled off her role, but the role was just one more smart alec girl who is hard to get to know.\n\nAnd it looks like Jaden is still learning about timing. The other characters were nice, especially his mom.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7114,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-12-16","keywords":"girlfriend,blue green hair,pink hair","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi456704281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc3YmViMGYtYjgyNi00NDg2LTk2MTEtNDVmOTI4ODQ2MzRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc3YmViMGYtYjgyNi00NDg2LTk2MTEtNDVmOTI4ODQ2MzRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"The movie follows 17-year-old Daryn who finds out that his girlfriend is dying. programme.title: Une histoire d'âme
Une histoire d'âme
programme.desc: Une histoire d'âme: Directed by Bénédicte Acolas. With Sophie Marceau. In an empty house, a woman, 40, lets herself go to her most motivating, deepest impulses." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4287014/","name":"Une histoire d'âme","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWY1MDI2OGQtNTA0ZS00OTY1LTgwYTctYTNkMjU3YzM3ZmEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQ2MTc3MjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"In an empty house, a woman, 40, lets herself go to her most motivating, deepest impulses.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4287014/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"linaneumann231"},"dateCreated":"2015-12-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another kind of movie","reviewBody":"The movie was a really interesting and kind of intense movie. Sophie Marceau is the only actress who plays in the movie and she does a great job. Victoria the character she plays is interesting.The camera was great. It was a journey trough metaphors, psychology and living. I liked the set and the mix of speaking and voice over. It was great to have another movie experience as most of the time. It wasn't easy to understand all the time which i really like (for example in Lynch movies) and has great cinematography. But the movie isn't a thing for everyone. You should like special, crazy things, be really interests in the movie world or like sights into the mind of a person. If you want to see 'another kind of movie'or see a movie which you could great analyze or interpreted in different ways you should definitely watch it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":73,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-12-03","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000521/","name":"Sophie Marceau"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6984057/","name":"Bénédicte Acolas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0423337/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014456/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0565812/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6984057/","name":"Bénédicte Acolas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000005/","name":"Ingmar Bergman"}],"duration":"PT1H22M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ronde De Nuit
Ronde de nuit
programme.desc: Ronde De Nuit: Directed by Isabelle Czajka. With Nacima Bekthaoui, Samir Boitard, Olivia Côte, Hedi Zada. Mila is a cop and she's back in Marseille after a few years away. She's a loner, damaged and always on her guard. She's looking for her father, whom she hasn't seen for fifteen years." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9812644/","name":"Ronde De Nuit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWU2NjI1NWMtN2U4MC00N2M0LWEzNjgtMTk2MjA0ZTg4NzMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0NTI0Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Mila is a cop and she's back in Marseille after a few years away. She's a loner, damaged and always on her guard. She's looking for her father, whom she hasn't seen for fifteen years.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9812644/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jcriche"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"I'm a sucker for Foreign Films","reviewBody":"I really don't think this was a bad movie, the way I've seen it reviewed, it was quite slow burning, but ultimately I found it enjoyable.\n\nI think the problem is, people watch this expecting USA types of crash, bang, wallop, action, this type of European movie isn't about that, and it is in my opinion better for it, perhaps not as slick as some I've seen, but still among imo some of the better movies I've seen.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-09-26","keywords":"france,marseille france,female police lieutenant,criminal investigation,female police commissioner","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6853413/","name":"Nacima Bekthaoui"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1822041/","name":"Samir Boitard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2015893/","name":"Olivia Côte"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0350597/","name":"Isabelle Czajka"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0419528/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0125554/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0124813/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8279997/","name":"Laura Piani"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Imitation Game
Imitation Game
programme.desc:
The Imitation Game: Directed by Morten Tyldum. With Benedict Cumberbatch, Keira Knightley, Matthew Goode, Rory Kinnear. During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2084970/","name":"The Imitation Game","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgwMzFiMWYtZDhlNS00ODNkLWJiODAtZDVhNzgyNzJhYjQ4L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzEzOTYxNTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2084970/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ClaytonDavis"},"dateCreated":"2014-09-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Morten Tyldum's espionage thriller about Alan Turing is purely sensational with a performance for the ages by Benedict Cumberbatch...","reviewBody":"It took a little over 24 hours before I weighed in on my official thoughts on Morten Tyldum's The Imitation Game from The Weinstein Company. My initial reaction upon leaving the screening room was it was astonishing, a magnificent achievement that stands tall as one of the year's best movies. As the film continues to settle within my cinematic soul, this very well could be the best film of the year, anchored by a career best performance from the amazing Benedict Cumberbatch. 

Full disclosure, I'm fairly oblivious to European history and the heroes that had a hand in one of the deadliest wars in history. I've heard the name Alan Turing from high school and college but either didn't care enough to learn or have no recollection of his contributions. Minutes following the screening, Amazon.com got $15.82 from my bank account in order to read "Alan Turing: The Enigma," the book in which screenwriter Graham Moore based the story upon. Telling the story of Alan Turing, a mathematician who in 1939 led a pioneer in cracking one of the most difficult codes in history. His contributions paved the way for essentially the way we exist now. However, Turing, who is a homosexual, has to wrestle with his secret in order to keep his status and his work years later.

Masterfully told and encompassing an emotional complexity, Tyldum's film is both engrossing and disturbing. It has genius aspirations in which it wants to exist in the cinematic world. It's an impeccable thriller, taut and brilliant, exploring the horrors of war along with the choices that doom mankind for all eternity. Tyldum is methodical and precise in which he decides to unravel the story, Turing is one of the fallen heroes of our history and his story stands as one of the most tragic. Screenwriter Moore crafts a murky, dark, yet totally enjoyable spy film that stands taller than any James Bond film ever released. It's a sure-fire Oscar contender for several Academy Awards including Best Picture. They should feel so lucky to have the gumption to choose something this methodical and majestic.

Benedict Cumberbatch continues to climb the ladder as one of the best actors working today. After impressive performances August: Osage County, 12 Years a Slave, and TV's "Sherlock," this is the role that will make him a bonafide movie star. Oscar-winner or not, this will be looked upon like the greats such as Gene Hackman in The French Connection or any legendary 70's movie that you love today. Cumberbatch hones in on all of Turing's character flaws and good qualities that make him a real person. He constructs him from the toes up, inflicting mannerisms and behaviors that all ring true. He stimulates all the sensual beats that keep us fixated on a performance. I can't help but go back to someone like Joaquin Phoenix in The Master, who delivered a construction of epic proportions. Though based on a real person, the talented Cumberbatch ignites his own masterpiece performance. He follows the demons of Turing down to his bones. Unsure, arrogant, and dismissive to the world around him, Turing shows only what he must, what he chooses, and every once in a while, we get a front seat to his soul. Thank you Cumberbatch.

The rest of the cast is completely on their game. It's probably a contender for the SAG Ensemble prize. Academy Award nominee Keira Knightley, as the feisty and fiery Joan Clark, is as loose and comfortable as I've ever seen her. She wears Joan like an old coat from the back of the closet. Remembering it fondly and seeing that it fits just perfect. She has all the things that make up an Oscar nominee; a scene that will likely bring you to tears, plenty of scenes that play as the comic relief in a dark tale, and being simply charming in every part of the film. 

I don't know when it's going to happen but the world needs to make Matthew Goode a mega-star. In his brief time on-screen, Goode makes his mark, becoming essentially a co-anchor with Knightley of the supporting players, showcasing a reason to give this guy his own leading role sooner rather than later. As our resident sleazy authority figure, Charles Dance shows that he's still got it. Mark Strong and Allen Leech also deliver memorable, fascinating scenes, both getting an opportunity to shine.

Technical merits are no shortage of excellence on display. Oscar- winning Editor William Goldenberg (Argo) shows that tension is his second language. Cutting the film to perfection, and forcing your heart into throat, this espionage thriller succeeds for general audiences because of Goldenberg's efforts. It's something that anyone can seek out and get fully immersed into. Alexandre Desplat tacks another impressive composition to his already thick resume. With films like The Grand Budapest Hotel already in his arsenal, I assume this to be another Oscar citation in his future. Shot by the talented Oscar Faura, responsible for painting the canvas that was J.A. Bayona's The Impossible, he utilizes the standard brilliance of capturing a moment. Knows when to pull back and get close. Let's not forget the Production and Costume Design by Maria Djurkovic and Sammy Sheldon Differ. Those two will surely be mentioned for the rest of the film year.

The Imitation Game is assertive and makes a serious claim as one of the best spy thrillers ever made. There are sub plots that all resonate and never feel forced. This will not only keep your tension level at a fever pitch but could leave you in tears to walk home with. It's a complete realistic view at the spy game that stands as one of the best films of the year and a performance for the ages from Benedict Cumberbatch. A captivating achievement that I'll likely remember for some time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":720004,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-01-07","keywords":"cryptography,world war two,enigma code,mathematician,closeted gay man","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3398414105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMzODk5OTY5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTU1NjUyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMzODk5OTY5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTU1NjUyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the real life story of legendary cryptanalyst Alan Turing, the film portrays the nail-biting race against time by Turing and his brilliant team of code-breakers at Britain's top-secret Government Code and Cypher School at Bletchley Park, during the darkest days of World War II.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1212722/","name":"Benedict Cumberbatch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461136/","name":"Keira Knightley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0328828/","name":"Matthew Goode"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878763/","name":"Morten Tyldum"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319513/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251858/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0457197/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2441699/","name":"Graham Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388132/","name":"Andrew Hodges"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Connasse, princesse des coeurs
Connasse, princesse des coeurs
programme.desc: Connasse, princesse des coeurs: Directed by Eloïse Lang, Noémie Saglio. With Camille Cottin, Cécile Boland, Lou Cottin, Rosie Mahon de Monaghan. A young woman, unsatisfied with her social class, decides to marry someone rich and powerful to be able to stop working and have whatever she wants for the rest of her days. This movie is entirely shot with hidden cameras." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4466362/","name":"Connasse, princesse des coeurs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWYyMmZjN2YtMWE1Mi00Y2NiLWI0ODktZGMzN2NlM2QwMWMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzY5NjkxNDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young woman, unsatisfied with her social class, decides to marry someone rich and powerful to be able to stop working and have whatever she wants for the rest of her days. This movie is entirely shot with hidden cameras.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4466362/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"searchanddestroy-1"},"dateCreated":"2015-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A terrific little comedy","reviewBody":"I crave for Camille Cottin, the actress who is the lead here. She is also famous for performing in a mini series shown on Canal Pjus channel where she plays in a hidden camera scheme with very very funny situations. Such as this one, in this film, where she is a sort of weird, lunatic and offensive Young woman dreaming of the Prince Harry and for whom she will stop at anything - and I mean ANYTHING - to achieve her dream. Entirely shot in hidden camera, this feature is itself an outstanding performance. This actress is also very daring, courageous, such as in the scene where she walks among the Horse Guards, with the 7 feet tall impressive horses all around her, with the feeling that they were going to crush her. Whao!!! And this very funny sequence where she climbs the Buckingham Palace fence to meet Prince Harry, and when some policemen finally arrive to arrest her. Camille Cottin later said off screen that, at start, when she grabbed the palace fence, NO ONE tried to prevent her to do that. So this lack of reaction from the authorities would have jeopardize the entire sequence. The ironic thing in this is that, at the beginning, all the shooting crew was afraid of the impossibility they would have met in approaching the Buckingham Palace fence...And the policemen finally took several minutes to arrive to ACTUALLY arrest her. IMDb data; ttnr: 4466362, Title: Connasse, princesse des coeurs, --- Description: Connasse, princesse des coeurs: Directed by Eloïse Lang, Noémie Saglio. With Camille Cottin, Cécile Boland, Lou Cottin, Rosie Mahon de Monaghan. A young woman, unsatisfied with her social class, decides to marry someone rich and powerful to be able to stop working and have whatever she wants for the rest of her days. This movie is entirely shot with hidden cameras." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4466362/","name":"Connasse, princesse des coeurs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWYyMmZjN2YtMWE1Mi00Y2NiLWI0ODktZGMzN2NlM2QwMWMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzY5NjkxNDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young woman, unsatisfied with her social class, decides to marry someone rich and powerful to be able to stop working and have whatever she wants for the rest of her days. This movie is entirely shot with hidden cameras.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4466362/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"searchanddestroy-1","dateCreated":"2015-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A terrific little comedy","reviewBody":"I crave for Camille Cottin, the actress who is the lead here. She is also famous for performing in a mini series shown on Canal Pjus channel where she plays in a hidden camera scheme with very very funny situations. Such as this one, in this film, where she is a sort of weird, lunatic and offensive Young woman dreaming of the Prince Harry and for whom she will stop at anything - and I mean ANYTHING - to achieve her dream. Entirely shot in hidden camera, this feature is itself an outstanding performance. This actress is also very daring, courageous, such as in the scene where she walks among the Horse Guards, with the 7 feet tall impressive horses all around her, with the feeling that they were going to crush her. Whao!!! And this very funny sequence where she climbs the Buckingham Palace fence to meet Prince Harry, and when some policemen finally arrive to arrest her. Camille Cottin later said off screen that, at start, when she grabbed the palace fence, NO ONE tried to prevent her to do that. So this lack of reaction from the authorities would have jeopardize the entire sequence. The ironic thing in this is that, at the beginning, all the shooting crew was afraid of the impossibility they would have met in approaching the Buckingham Palace fence...And the policemen finally took several minutes to arrive to ACTUALLY arrest her. A situation for which every one in the film crew was prepared for to enhance the screenplay.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1343,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-04-29","keywords":"france,year 2014,year 2015,hidden camera film,paris france","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1082702873","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjc0N2ViYzEtN2M3NC00M2NjLWFjMDgtNWFkZTRhYWQ3OWI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjc0N2ViYzEtN2M3NC00M2NjLWFjMDgtNWFkZTRhYWQ3OWI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1891185/","name":"Camille Cottin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2512952/","name":"Cécile Boland","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7633674/","name":"Lou Cottin"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5959317/","name":"Eloïse Lang","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2015017/","name":"Noémie Saglio"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007686/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0534585/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197387/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5959317/","name":"Eloïse Lang","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2015017/","name":"Noémie Saglio"],"duration":"PT1H20M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Rupan sansei: Kariosutoro no shiro
Le château de Cagliostro
programme.desc:
Rupan sansei: Kariosutoro no shiro: Directed by Hayao Miyazaki. With Yasuo Yamada, Eiko Masuyama, Kiyoshi Kobayashi, Makio Inoue. A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and an intrepid policeman struggle to free a princess from an evil count's clutches, and learn the hidden secret to a fabulous treasure that she holds part of a key to." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0079833/","name":"Rupan sansei: Kariosutoro no shiro","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzYyNjg3OTctNzA2ZS00NjkzLWE4MmYtZDAzZWQ0NzkyMTJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and an intrepid policeman struggle to free a princess from an evil count's clutches, and learn the hidden secret to a fabulous treasure that she holds part of a key to.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0079833/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Teebs2"},"dateCreated":"2006-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Adventures of Arsene Lupin III","reviewBody":"Early feature directed by the now world famous Japanese animator, Hayao Miyazaki. A roguish thief, Lupin III, attempts to save the Lady Clarisse de Cagliostro from an evil Count, both of them well aware that she holds the secret to a legendary hidden treasure.

The animation is, unsurprisingly, much less sophisticated than in the later Studio Ghibli films, or even those released only a few years after such as "Nausicaa". However, the quality is still very high and Miyazaki's trademark attention to detail, particularly with machines, is noticeable already.

The character animation is much broader and more obviously cartoon-like but this matches the very light tone of the film - this is an all-out action comedy adventure, after all! The details in the film give it a very European feel, from the costumes to the cars (wonderfully animated Fiat 500 and Citroen 2CV), and I was most reminded of Herge's "Tintin" adventure series.

This film is good fun, though I did find the pacing a little uneven, and particularly recommended to those who enjoy their animated films a bit simpler and more conventional than most of Studio Ghibli's output.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":29089,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"genre":["Animation","Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"1979-12-15","keywords":"ring,treasure,counterfeit money,damsel in distress,castle","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Castle of Cagliostro","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2743730457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGJiY2VlZGQtNjI1Mi00NTgwLWEyOGUtOTAwZDFlYzI2Mjg2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGJiY2VlZGQtNjI1Mi00NTgwLWEyOGUtOTAwZDFlYzI2Mjg2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0945280/","name":"Yasuo Yamada"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557968/","name":"Eiko Masuyama"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462017/","name":"Kiyoshi Kobayashi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0594503/","name":"Hayao Miyazaki"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064579/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0700578/","name":"Monkey Punch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0594503/","name":"Hayao Miyazaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500897/","name":"Haruya Yamazaki"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Men, Women & Children
Men, Women & Children
programme.desc:
Men, Women & Children: Directed by Jason Reitman. With Adam Sandler, Jennifer Garner, Rosemarie DeWitt, Judy Greer. A group of high school teenagers and their parents attempt to navigate the many ways the Internet has changed their relationships, their communications, their self-images, and their love lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3179568/","name":"Men, Women & Children","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAwMzc2OTgwOTZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDg2ODA4NjIx._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of high school teenagers and their parents attempt to navigate the many ways the Internet has changed their relationships, their communications, their self-images, and their love lives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3179568/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"briand6465"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Smartphones, Social Media, Surveillance","reviewBody":"Smartphones, Social Media, Surveillance, Spying: Saw Men, Women & Children starring Adam Sandler, Kaitlyn Dever, Rosemarie DeWitt, Jennifer Garner, and Ansel Elgort at AMC Theatres. The film basically depicts the times we live in; and what I mean by that is how the Internet and technology has changed our lives.

The main characters including high school students and their parents are followed throughout the movie which focuses on how the Internet impacts their relationships, communication, self-image, and love lives.

Several societal social issues are explored including, video games behavioral impact on teenage boys, the emotional impact of spreading rumors, per-marital sex, teen pregnancy, eating disorders, drug use, divorce, infidelity, Internet safety, fame-hunting, and pornography.

Each character/relationship is tested throughout the movie; which shows us, the audience, a variety of roads people choose in their lives; some negative, some positive; but no matter the road taken, the one thing that is very noticeably clear; immunity to the significant societal social change through the use of our smartphones, tablets, and computers in our society is unavoidable.

I found the film somewhat difficult to follow, but the narration by Emma Thompson did make that easier to do. Not the most entertaining film, but most definitely one that comes with many life lesson messages. Not a must see, but if you are looking for a different kind of film which delves in to societal social issues, go see it. The film attempts to stare down social issues such as video game culture, anorexia, infidelity, fame hunting, and the proliferation of illicit material on the internet. IMDb data; ttnr: 3179568, Title: Men, Women & Children, --- Description: Men, Women & Children: Directed by Jason Reitman. With Adam Sandler, Jennifer Garner, Rosemarie DeWitt, Judy Greer. A group of high school teenagers and their parents attempt to navigate the many ways the Internet has changed their relationships, their communications, their self-images, and their love lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3179568/","name":"Men, Women & Children","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAwMzc2OTgwOTZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDg2ODA4NjIx._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of high school teenagers and their parents attempt to navigate the many ways the Internet has changed their relationships, their communications, their self-images, and their love lives.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3179568/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"briand6465","dateCreated":"2014-10-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Smartphones, Social Media, Surveillance","reviewBody":"Smartphones, Social Media, Surveillance, Spying: Saw Men, Women & Children starring Adam Sandler, Kaitlyn Dever, Rosemarie DeWitt, Jennifer Garner, and Ansel Elgort at AMC Theatres. The film basically depicts the times we live in; and what I mean by that is how the Internet and technology has changed our lives.

The main characters including high school students and their parents are followed throughout the movie which focuses on how the Internet impacts their relationships, communication, self-image, and love lives.

Several societal social issues are explored including, video games behavioral impact on teenage boys, the emotional impact of spreading rumors, per-marital sex, teen pregnancy, eating disorders, drug use, divorce, infidelity, Internet safety, fame-hunting, and pornography.

Each character/relationship is tested throughout the movie; which shows us, the audience, a variety of roads people choose in their lives; some negative, some positive; but no matter the road taken, the one thing that is very noticeably clear; immunity to the significant societal social change through the use of our smartphones, tablets, and computers in our society is unavoidable.

I found the film somewhat difficult to follow, but the narration by Emma Thompson did make that easier to do. Not the most entertaining film, but most definitely one that comes with many life lesson messages. Not a must see, but if you are looking for a different kind of film which delves in to societal social issues, go see it. programme.title: Lulu femme nue
Lulu femme nue
programme.desc: Lulu femme nue: Directed by Sólveig Anspach. With Karin Viard, Bouli Lanners, Claude Gensac, Pascal Demolon. Following a botched job interview, Lulu decides not to return home, leaving her husband and their three children in the lurch. She premeditated nothing; it all happened quite simply. She steals a few days of freedom for herself, alone, on the coast with no other purpose in mind than to take full advantage of the moment, without feeling guilty about it. On the way, she crosses paths with a variety of people who, like herself, are at the edge of the world: a strange guy protected by his brothers; an old woman who is bored to death; a female employee hassled by her female boss. Three decisive encounters that will help Lulu rediscover an old acquaintance she's not seen for years: herself." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2593230/","name":"Lulu femme nue","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTNmMzc2N2MtNDIxYy00NDA5LWE2MTUtYTI3N2M0ZmEwNGU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzE2ODIxNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following a botched job interview, Lulu decides not to return home, leaving her husband and their three children in the lurch. programme.title: Obama
programme.desc: En 2007, Barack Obama annonce sa candidature à l'élection présidentielle. Sa campagne s'avère harassante tant il doit combattre contre de nombreux adversaires politiques. Jelani Cobb, David Axelrod, John Lewis, Cornel West, Jesse Jackson ou encore Ta-Nehisi Coates reviennent sur des moments marquants de cette période et analysent, avec le recul, l'importance de certains discours et engagements du candidat, poussé sans cesse à définir son identité.

programme.title: Obama
programme.desc: En 2007, Barack Obama annonce sa candidature à l'élection présidentielle qui aura lieu l'année suivante. Sa campagne se révèle harassante, tant il doit se battre sur tous les fronts, contre ses adversaires politiques mais également au sein de sa propre famille démocrate. Jelani Cobb, David Axelrod, John Lewis, Cornel West, Jesse Jackson ou encore Ta-Nehisi Coates reviennent sur des moments marquants de cette période et analysent, avec le recul, l'importance de certains discours et engagements du candidat, poussé sans cesse à définir son identité. Ce deuxième volet se consacre à l'intense période précédant l'élection de Barack Obama et mesure l'impact de celle-ci sur la vie des Américains.

programme.title: Fini de jouer
programme.desc: A 32 ans, Abe Applebaum n'est plus que l'ombre de ce qu'il a été. Détective prodige dès l'âge de 13 ans, le jeune homme a connu une certaine notoriété avant de déchoir sévèrement. Désormais légèrement alcoolique, Abe, 32 ans, vit toujours dans la ville pavillonnaire de Willowbrook, sous le regard navré de ses parents et en est réduit à traiter des affaires mineures, souvent très mal rémunérées. Tout change quand Caroline, une de ses anciennes clientes, vient le voir pour l'aider à résoudre le meurtre de son petit ami, tué de 17 coups de couteaux.

programme.title: Grand Central
programme.desc: Drame.

programme.title: Argo
programme.desc: En 1979, lors de la prise de l'ambassade américaine à Téhéran par les révolutionnaires iraniens, soixante Américains sont pris en otage. Mais, au beau lieu du chaos, six employés parviennent à s'échapper. Ils se réfugient au domicile de l'ambassadeur canadien. Tony Mendez, agent de la CIA spécialiste de l'exfiltration, tente de trouver un plan pour les sauver. Il a l'idée de faire passer les employés pour des techniciens de cinéma venus en repérage en Iran pour tourner un film de science-fiction. Ce thriller dramatique est inspiré de faits vécus.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: Caméléon domestique, Rango est tout sauf aventurier. Le hasard lui joue un mauvais tour et il se retrouve perdu au beau milieu du désert. Après avoir échappé de peu à un aigle, il fait la connaissance de Fève, une femelle lézard. Celle-ci vient d'une petite ville du Far West, Poussière, où elle emmène son nouvel ami. Rango décide de s'y faire passer pour un héros et impressionne les habitants, bien aidé par un heureux concours de circonstances. John, la vieille tortue maire du village, le nomme alors shérif. Il doit enquêter sur la pénurie d'eau qui assèche la ville.

programme.title: Les Croods
programme.desc: Les Crood, famille de Néandertal, vit selon des règles bien précises, dictées par le père, Grug, depuis des années. Pour éviter l'extinction, Grug interdit toute prise de risque à sa femme et à ses enfants. Mais Eep, adolescente, ne supporte plus ce mode de vie corseté. Tout change quand elle rencontre Guy, un jeune homme qui sait maîtriser le feu. Le lendemain, la destruction de leur caverne pousse les Crood a découvrir un monde qui leur était inconnu.

programme.title: Music
programme.desc: Atteinte de troubles autistiques, la jeune Music vit avec sa grand-mère. S’échappant dans un monde de rêve, Music mène par ailleurs une existence pleine de rituels. Un jour, sa grand-mère meurt. La jeune fille est alors confiée à sa demi-soeur, Zu, une toxicomane récemment sortie de cure. Cette dernière ne sait pas bien comment s’y prendre et commet des maladresses. Lors d’une crise de Music, Ebo, un voisin, propose son aide à Zu. il sait comment calmer l’adolescente. Et Zu trouve un livre laissé par sa grand-mère qui détaille la routine quotidienne de Music.

programme.title: Nous trois ou rien
programme.desc: Dans les années 1950, Hibat passe une enfance simple mais heureuse dans un petit village du Sud de l'Iran. A l'université, dans les années 70, le jeune homme, aspirant avocat, se découvre une conscience politique. Contestataire, il est bientôt condamné à 10 ans de prison par le régime du Shah. Grâce à Jean-Paul Sartre, il parvient à donner une interview à un journal français. Malgré un traitement brutal, il s'obstine et devient l'un des plus célèbres opposants au régime, qui n'a d'autre choix que lui rendre sa liberté.

programme.title: Night Call
programme.desc: A Los Angeles, Lou Bloom, criminel qui vit d'expédients, découvre le travail des cameramen, à la recherche d'images explosives. Il s'en procure une et décide de se mettre à son compte. Ses moyens et son matériel sont très limités et ses premiers essais sont hasardeux mais Lou persévère. Il veut se faire une place dans le métier et impressionner Nina Romina, directrice de l'information de Channel 6, une chaine de télévision locale.

programme.title: Les beaux jours
programme.desc: Dans une ville balnéaire du nord de la France. Caroline, dentiste à la retraite, accepte, un peu réticente, l'offre de ses enfants qui l'ont inscrite au club de loisirs pour seniors Les Beaux Jours où se rencontrent des gens de son âge pour exercer diverses activités. Après un premier contact difficile, elle finit par s'y rendre avec plaisir et y fait une belle rencontre. Caroline sympathise en effet avec Julien, qui lui donne des cours d'informatique. Le jeune homme devient bientôt son amant. A ses côtés, elle retrouve une joie de vivre toute spontanée.

programme.title: Les grands esprits
programme.desc: François Foucault, agrégé de lettres, est un impitoyable professeur de français à Henri IV. Alors qu'il accompagne Pierre, son père, célèbre écrivain, à la présentation de son nouveau livre, il fait la connaissance de la séduisante Agathe Kaufman, qui travaille pour le ministère de l'éducation nationale. Pour l'impressionner, il affirme que les professeurs expérimentés devraient travailler dans les banlieues difficiles. Celle-ci le prend au mot et François se retrouve bientôt affecté pour un an dans un collège de banlieue parisienne.

programme.title: Sex Doll
programme.desc: A Londres, Virginie, une jeune française qui se prostitue pour le compte de Raphaëlle auprès de riches clients, tient à vivre sans attaches. Au cours d'une soirée dans une boite de nuit avec son amie Electre, elle croise le chemin de Rupert, un jeune anglais qui la trouble immédiatement. Alors qu'elle ne peut oublier cette rencontre, Virginie recroise Rupert au cours d'une soirée dans un appartement.

programme.title: Né quelque part
programme.desc: Le père de Farid apprend qu'il est malade et demande à son fils de se rendre en Algérie pour sauver la maison familiale de la démolition. Le jeune homme, promis à une belle carrière d'avocat, n'a jamais mis les pieds en Algérie et accepte à contrecœur cette mission. Sur place, il fait la connaissance de son cousin et de ses amis. Tout bascule quand le cousin vole ses papiers pour partir en France. Farid se retrouve obligé de faire des démarches contraignantes pour faire renouveler ses papiers. En attendant, il est bloqué en Algérie.

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0295620, Title: SOKO Kitzbühel, --- Description: SOKO Kitzbühel: With Heinz Marecek, Andrea L'Arronge, Ferry Oellinger, Kristina Sprenger.
